  233: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------

  236: 
  237: all() ->
  238:     [
  239:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  240:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  241:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  242:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
  243:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
  244:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
  245:     ] ++ simple_api_tests().
  246: 
  247: groups() ->
  248:     [
  249:      {'tlsv1.3', [], ((gen_api_tests() ++ tls13_group() ++
  250:                            handshake_paus_tests()) --
  251:                           [dh_params,
  252:                            honor_server_cipher_order,
  253:                            honor_client_cipher_order,
  254:                            new_options_in_handshake,
  255:                            handshake_continue_tls13_client,
  256:                            invalid_options])
  257:       ++ (since_1_2() -- [conf_signature_algs])},
  258:      {'tlsv1.2', [],  gen_api_tests() ++ since_1_2() ++ handshake_paus_tests() ++ pre_1_3()},
  259:      {'tlsv1.1', [],  gen_api_tests() ++ handshake_paus_tests() ++ pre_1_3()},
  260:      {'tlsv1', [],  gen_api_tests() ++ handshake_paus_tests() ++ pre_1_3() ++ beast_mitigation_test()},
  261:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], gen_api_tests() -- [new_options_in_handshake, hibernate_server] ++
  262:           handshake_paus_tests() -- [handshake_continue_tls13_client] ++ pre_1_3()},
  263:      {'dtlsv1', [],  gen_api_tests() -- [new_options_in_handshake, hibernate_server] ++
  264:           handshake_paus_tests() -- [handshake_continue_tls13_client] ++ pre_1_3()}
  265:     ].
  266: 
  267: since_1_2() ->
  268:     [
  269:      conf_signature_algs,
  270:      no_common_signature_algs,
  271:      versions_option_based_on_sni
  272:     ].
  273: 
  274: pre_1_3() ->
  275:     [
  276:      default_reject_anonymous,
  277:      connection_information_with_srp
  278:     ].
  279: 
  280: simple_api_tests() ->
  281:     [
  282:      invalid_keyfile,
  283:      invalid_certfile,
  284:      invalid_cacertfile,
  285:      invalid_dhfile,
  286:      invalid_options,
  287:      options_not_proplist,
  288:      options_whitebox,
  289:      format_error
  290:     ].
  291: 
  292:

  297:      select_best_cert,
  298:      select_sha1_cert,
  299:      connection_information,
  300:      secret_connection_info,

  305:      dh_params,
  306:      hibernate_client,
  307:      hibernate_server,
  308:      listen_socket,
  309:      peername,

  313:      recv_no_active_msg,
  314:      recv_timeout,
  315:      recv_close,

  319:      close_with_timeout,

  321:      call_in_error_state,
  322:      close_transport_accept,

  338: 
  339: handshake_paus_tests() ->
  340:     [
  341:      handshake_continue, 
  342:      handshake_continue_timeout,
  343:      handshake_continue_change_verify,
  344:      hello_client_cancel,
  345:      hello_server_cancel,
  346:      handshake_continue_tls13_client
  347:     ].
  348: 
  349: %% Only relevant for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0
  350: beast_mitigation_test() ->
  351:     [%% Original option
  352:      rizzo_disabled,
  353:      %% Same effect as disable
  354:      rizzo_zero_n, 
  355:      %% Same as default
  356:      rizzo_one_n_minus_one 
  357:     ].
  358: 
  359: tls13_group() ->
  360:     [
  361:      supported_groups,
  362:      honor_server_cipher_order_tls13,
  363:      honor_client_cipher_order_tls13,
  364:      client_options_negative_version_gap,
  365:      client_options_negative_dependency_version,
  366:      client_options_negative_dependency_stateless,
  367:      client_options_negative_dependency_role,
  368:      client_options_negative_early_data,
  369:      server_options_negative_early_data,
  370:      server_options_negative_version_gap,
  371:      server_options_negative_dependency_role,
  372:      server_options_negative_stateless_tickets_seed,
  373:      invalid_options_tls13,
  374:      cookie,
  375:      exporter_master_secret_consumed
  376:     ].
  377: 
  378: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  379:     catch crypto:stop(),
  380:     try crypto:start() of
  381: 	ok ->
  382: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  383: 	    ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0)
  384:     catch _:_ ->
  385: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  386:     end.
  387: 
  388: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  389:     ssl:stop(),
  390:     application:unload(ssl),
  391:     application:stop(crypto).
  392: 
  393: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  394:     case ssl_test_lib:is_protocol_version(GroupName) of
  395:         true  ->
  396:             ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, 
  397:                                         [{client_type, erlang},
  398:                                          {server_type, erlang},
  399:                                          {version, GroupName}
  400:                                         | Config]);
  401:         false -> 
  402:             Config
  403:     end.
  404: 
  405: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  406:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  407: 
  408: init_per_testcase(handshake_continue_tls13_client, Config) ->
  409:     case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of
  410:         true ->
  411:             ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  412:             ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  413:             Config;
  414:         false ->
  415:             {skip, "Missing crypto support: TLS 1.3 not supported"}
  416:     end;
  417: init_per_testcase(connection_information_with_srp, Config) ->
  418:     PKAlg = proplists:get_value(public_keys, crypto:supports()),
  419:     case lists:member(srp, PKAlg) of
  420:         true ->
  421:             Config;
  422:         false ->
  423:             {skip, "Missing SRP crypto support"}
  424:     end;
  425: init_per_testcase(conf_signature_algs, Config) ->
  426:     case ssl_test_lib:appropriate_sha(crypto:supports()) of
  427:         sha256 ->
  428:             ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  429:             ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  430:             Config;
  431:         sha ->
  432:             {skip, "Tests needs certs with sha256"}
  433:     end;
  434: init_per_testcase(check_random_nonce, Config) ->
  435:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  436:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  437:     Config;
  438: init_per_testcase(select_best_cert, Config) ->
  439:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  440:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  441:     %% We need to make sure TLS-1.3 can be supported as
  442:     %% want to generate a TLS-1.3 specific certificate that will not
  443:     %% be chosen
  444:     case Version of
  445:         'tlsv1.2' ->
  446:               case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of
  447:                   true ->
  448:                       Config;
  449:                   false ->
  450:                       {skip, "Crypto does not support EDDSA"}
  451:               end;
  452:         _ ->
  453:             Config
  454:     end;
  455: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  456:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  457:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  458:     Config.
  459: 
  460: end_per_testcase(internal_active_n, _Config) ->
  461:     application:unset_env(ssl, internal_active_n);
  462: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->     
  463:     Config.
  464: 
  465: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  466: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  467: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  468: peercert() ->
  469:     [{doc,"Test API function peercert/1"}].
  470: peercert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  471:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  472:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  473:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  474: 
  475:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  476: 					{from, self()},
  477: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  478: 			   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  479:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  480:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  481: 					{host, Hostname},
  482: 			   {from, self()},
  483: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  484: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  485: 
  486:     CertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerOpts),
  487:     [{'Certificate', BinCert, _}]= ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(CertFile),
  488: 
  489:     ServerMsg = {error, no_peercert},
  490:     ClientMsg = {ok, BinCert},
  491: 
  492:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  493: 
  494:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
  495: 
  496:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  497:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  498: 
  499: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  500: 
  501: peercert_with_client_cert() ->
  502:     [{doc,"Test API function peercert/1"}].
  503: peercert_with_client_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  504:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  505:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  506:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  507: 
  508:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  509: 					{from, self()},
  510: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  511: 			   {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  512:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  513:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  514: 					{host, Hostname},
  515: 			   {from, self()},
  516: 			   {mfa, {ssl, peercert, []}},
  517: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  518: 
  519:     ServerCertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerOpts),
  520:     [{'Certificate', ServerBinCert, _}]= ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(ServerCertFile),
  521:      ClientCertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ClientOpts),
  522:     [{'Certificate', ClientBinCert, _}]= ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(ClientCertFile),
  523: 
  524:     ServerMsg = {ok, ClientBinCert},
  525:     ClientMsg = {ok, ServerBinCert},
  526: 
  527:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  528: 
  529:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
  530: 
  531:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  532:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  533: 
  534: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  535: select_best_cert() ->
  536:     [{doc,"Basic test of the certs_keys option."}].
  537: 
  538: select_best_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  539:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  540:     Conf = test_config(Version, Config),
  541:     lists:foreach(
  542:       fun({#{server_config := SConfig,
  543:              client_config := CConfig},
  544:            {client_peer, CExpected},
  545:            {server_peer, SExpected}}) ->
  546:               selected_peer(CExpected, SExpected,
  547:                             ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(CConfig, Config),
  548:                             ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SConfig, Config),
  549:                             Conf)
  550:       end, Conf).
  551: 
  552: 
  553: 
  554: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  555: select_sha1_cert() ->
  556:     [{doc,"Use cert signed with rsa and sha1"}].
  557: 
  558: select_sha1_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  559:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  560:     TestConfRSA =
  561:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  562:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  563:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  564:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  565:                                                              {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  566:                                           peer =>  [{digest, sha}, {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]
  567:                                          },
  568:                                     client_chain =>
  569:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  570:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
  571:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  572:                                                              {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  573:                                           peer => [{digest, sha},
  574:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}),
  575: 
  576:     TestConfECDSA =
  577:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  578:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  579:                                                    {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}],
  580:                                           intermediates =>
  581:                                               [[{digest, sha},
  582:                                                 {key,{namedCurve, secp256r1}}]],
  583:                                           peer =>  [{digest, sha},
  584:                                                     {key,{namedCurve, secp256r1}}]
  585:                                          },
  586:                                     client_chain =>
  587:                                         #{root => [{digest, sha},
  588:                                                    {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}],
  589:                                           intermediates => [[{digest, sha},
  590:                                                              {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}]],
  591:                                           peer => [{digest, sha},
  592:                                                    {key, {namedCurve, secp256r1}}]}}),
  593:     test_sha1_cert_conf(Version, TestConfRSA, TestConfECDSA, Config).
  594: 
  595: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  596: connection_information() ->
  597:     [{doc,"Test the API function ssl:connection_information/1"}].
  598: connection_information(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  599:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  600:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  601:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  602:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  603: 					{from, self()},
  604: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_information_result, []}},
  605: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
  606: 
  607:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  608:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  609: 					{host, Hostname},
  610: 			   {from, self()},
  611: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, connection_information_result, []}},
  612: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  613: 
  614:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  615: 
  616:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  617: 
  618:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  619:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  620: 
  621: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  622: connection_information_with_srp() ->
  623:     [{doc,"Test the result of API function ssl:connection_information/1"
  624:           "includes srp_username."}].
  625: connection_information_with_srp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  626:     run_conn_info_srp_test(srp_anon, 'aes_128_cbc', Config).
  627: 
  628: run_conn_info_srp_test(Kex, Cipher, Config) ->
  629:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  630:     TestCiphers = ssl_test_lib:test_ciphers(Kex, Cipher, Version),
  631: 
  632:     case TestCiphers of
  633:         [] ->
  634:             {skip, {not_sup, Kex, Cipher, Version}};
  635:         [TestCipher | _T] ->
  636:             do_run_conn_info_srp_test(TestCipher, Version, Config)
  637:     end.
  638: 
  639: do_run_conn_info_srp_test(ErlangCipherSuite, Version, Config) ->
  640:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  641: 
  642:     SOpts = [{user_lookup_fun, {fun ssl_test_lib:user_lookup/3, undefined}}],
  643:     COpts = [{verify, verify_none}, {srp_identity, {"Test-User", "secret"}}],
  644: 
  645:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts, Config),
  646:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts, Config),
  647: 
  648:     ?CT_LOG("Erlang Cipher Suite is: ~p~n", [ErlangCipherSuite]),
  649: 
  650:     Server =
  651:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  652:                                    {from, self()},
  653:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, check_srp_in_connection_information, [<<"Test-User">>, server]}},
  654:                                    {options, [{versions, [Version]}, {ciphers, [ErlangCipherSuite]} |
  655:                                               ServerOpts]}]),
  656:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  657:     Client =
  658:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(
  659:           [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  660:            {host, Hostname},
  661:            {from, self()},
  662:            {mfa, {?MODULE, check_srp_in_connection_information, [<<"Test-User">>, client]}},
  663:            {options, [{versions, [Version]}, {ciphers, [ErlangCipherSuite]} |
  664:                       ClientOpts]}]),
  665: 
  666:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  667: 
  668:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  669:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  670: 
  671: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  672: 
  673: secret_connection_info() ->
  674:     [{doc,"Test the API function ssl:connection_information/2"}].
  675: secret_connection_info(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  676:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  677:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  678:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  679: 
  680:     Server =
  681:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  682:                                    {from, self()},
  683:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, secret_connection_info_result, []}},
  684:                                    {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  685:     
  686:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  687:     Client =
  688:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  689:                                    {host, Hostname},
  690:                                    {from, self()},
  691:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, secret_connection_info_result, []}},
  692:                                    {options,  [{verify, verify_peer} |ClientOpts]}]),
  693:     
  694:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  695: 			   
  696:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, true, Client, true),
  697:     
  698:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  699:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  700: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  701: keylog_connection_info() ->
  702:     [{doc,"Test the API function ssl:connection_information/2"}].
  703: keylog_connection_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  704:     keylog_connection_info(Config, true),
  705:     keylog_connection_info(Config, false).
  706: keylog_connection_info(Config, KeepSecrets) ->
  707:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  708:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  709:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  710: 
  711:     Server =
  712:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  713:                                    {from, self()},
  714:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, keylog_connection_info_result, [KeepSecrets]}},
  715:                                    {options, [{verify, verify_peer}, {keep_secrets, KeepSecrets} | ServerOpts]}]),
  716: 
  717:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  718:     Client =
  719:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  720:                                    {host, Hostname},
  721:                                    {from, self()},
  722:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, keylog_connection_info_result, [KeepSecrets]}},
  723:                                    {options,  [{verify, verify_peer}, {keep_secrets, KeepSecrets} |ClientOpts]}]),
  724: 
  725:     ?CT_LOG("KeepSecrets ~p Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [KeepSecrets, Client, Server]),
  726: 
  727:     ServerKeylog = receive
  728:                        {Server, {ok, Keylog}} ->
  729:                            Keylog;
  730:                        {Server, ServerError} ->
  731:                            ct:fail({server, ServerError})
  732:                    after 5000 ->
  733:                            ct:fail({server, timeout})
  734:                    end,
  735: 
  736:     receive
  737:         {Client, {ok, ServerKeylog}} ->
  738:             ok;
  739:         {Client, {ok, ClientKeylog}} ->
  740:             ct:fail({mismatch, {ServerKeylog, ClientKeylog}});
  741:         {Client, ClientError} ->
  742:             ct:fail({client, ClientError})
  743:     after 5000 ->
  744:             ct:fail({client, timeout})
  745:     end,
  746: 
  747:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  748:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  749: 
  750: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  751: dh_params() ->
  752:     [{doc,"Test to specify DH-params file in server."}].
  753: 
  754: dh_params(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  755:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  756:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  757:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  758:     DHParamFile = filename:join(DataDir, "dHParam.pem"),
  759: 
  760:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  761:     
  762:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  763: 					{from, self()}, 
  764: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  765: 			   {options, [{dhfile, DHParamFile} | ServerOpts]}]),
  766:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  767:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  768: 					{host, Hostname},
  769: 			   {from, self()}, 
  770: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  771: 			   {options,
  772: 			    [{ciphers,[{dhe_rsa,aes_256_cbc,sha}]} | 
  773: 				       ClientOpts]}]),
  774:     
  775:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  776:     
  777:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  778:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  779: 
  780: 
  781: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  782: invalid_dhfile() ->
  783:     [{doc,"Test to check invalid DH-params file in server."}].
  784: invalid_dhfile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  785:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  786:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  787:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  788:     DHParamFile = filename:join(DataDir, "dHParam-invalid.pem"),
  789: 
  790:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  791: 
  792:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  793:                                               {from, self()},
  794:                                               {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  795:                                                      send_recv_result_active,
  796:                                                      []}},
  797:                                                {options, [{dhfile, DHParamFile}
  798:                                                           | ServerOpts]}]),
  799:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  800:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  801:                                               {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
  802:                                               {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  803:                                                      send_recv_result_active,
  804:                                                      []}},
  805:                                               {options, [{ciphers,
  806:                                                           [{dhe_rsa,
  807:                                                             aes_256_cbc, sha}]}
  808:                                                          | ClientOpts]}]),
  809: 
  810:     %% assert server error
  811:     [{Server, {error, {options, {dhfile, DHParamFile,
  812:                                  {error, {asn1,
  813:                                           {{invalid_value, 0}, _Stack}}}}}}}] =
  814:         ssl_test_lib:get_result([Server]),
  815: 
  816:     %% assert client error
  817:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, {error, closed}),
  818: 
  819:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  820:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  821: 
  822: 
  823: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  824: conf_signature_algs() ->
  825:     [{doc,"Test to set the signature_algs option on both client and server"}].
  826: conf_signature_algs(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  827:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  828:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  829:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  830:     Server = 
  831: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  832: 				   {from, self()}, 
  833: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  834: 				   {options,  [{active, false}, {signature_algs, [{sha256, rsa}]}, 
  835:                                                {versions, ['tlsv1.2']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  836:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  837:     Client = 
  838: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  839: 				   {host, Hostname},
  840: 				   {from, self()}, 
  841: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  842: 				   {options, [{active, false}, {signature_algs, [{sha256, rsa}]},
  843:                                               {versions, ['tlsv1.2']} | ClientOpts]}]),
  844:     
  845:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  846:     
  847:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  848:     
  849:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  850:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  851: 
  852: 
  853: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  854: no_common_signature_algs()  ->
  855:     [{doc,"Set the signature_algs option so that there client and server does not share any hash sign algorithms"}].
  856: no_common_signature_algs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  857:     
  858:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  859:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  860: 
  861:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  862: 
  863: 
  864:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  865: 					      {from, self()},
  866: 					      {options, [{signature_algs, [{sha256, rsa}]}
  867: 							 | ServerOpts]}]),
  868:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  869:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  870:                                               {host, Hostname},
  871:                                               {from, self()},
  872:                                               {options, [{signature_algs, [{sha384, rsa}]}
  873:                                                          | ClientOpts]}]),
  874:     
  875:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, insufficient_security).
  876: 
  877: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  878: handshake_continue() ->
  879:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue/3"}].
  880: handshake_continue(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  881:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  882:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  883:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  884: 
  885:     Server =
  886:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  887:                                    {host, Hostname},
  888:                                    {from, self()},
  889:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  890:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{reuseaddr, true},
  891:                                                                             {verify, verify_peer},
  892:                                                                        {handshake, hello} | ServerOpts
  893:                                                                       ],
  894:                                                                       Config)},
  895:                                    {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ServerOpts)}
  896:                                   ]),
  897:     
  898:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  899: 
  900:     Client =
  901:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  902:                                    {host, Hostname},
  903:                                    {from, self()},
  904:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  905:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
  906:                                                                        {verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts
  907:                                                                       ],
  908:                                                                       Config)},
  909:                                    {continue_options,  [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
  910:      
  911:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  912:     
  913:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  914:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  915: 
  916: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  917: handshake_continue_tls13_client() ->
  918:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue/3 with fixed TLS 1.3 client"}].
  919: handshake_continue_tls13_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  920:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  921:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  922:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  923:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  924:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  925:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  926:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  927:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),
  928:     Server =
  929:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  930:                                    {from, self()},
  931:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  932:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{reuseaddr, true},
  933:                                                                        {verify, verify_peer},
  934:                                                                        {ciphers, SCiphers},
  935:                                                                       {handshake, hello} | ServerOpts
  936:                                                                       ],
  937:                                                                      Config)},
  938:                                    {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ServerOpts)}
  939:                                   ]),
  940: 
  941:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  942: 
  943:     DummyTicket =
  944:         <<131,116,0,0,0,5,100,0,4,104,107,100,102,100,0,6,115,104,97,51,
  945:           56,52,100,0,3,112,115,107,109,0,0,0,48,150,90,38,127,26,12,5,
  946:           228,180,235,229,214,215,27,236,149,182,82,14,140,50,81,0,150,
  947:           248,152,180,193,207,80,52,107,196,200,2,77,4,96,140,65,239,205,
  948:           224,125,129,179,147,103,100,0,3,115,110,105,107,0,25,112,114,
  949:           111,117,100,102,111,111,116,46,111,116,112,46,101,114,105,99,
  950:           115,115,111,110,46,115,101,100,0,6,116,105,99,107,101,116,104,6,
  951:           100,0,18,110,101,119,95,115,101,115,115,105,111,110,95,116,105,
  952:           99,107,101,116,98,0,0,28,32,98,127,110,83,249,109,0,0,0,8,0,0,0,
  953:           0,0,0,0,5,109,0,0,0,113,112,154,74,26,27,0,111,147,51,110,216,
  954:           43,45,4,100,215,152,195,118,96,22,34,1,184,170,42,166,238,109,
  955:           187,138,196,147,102,205,116,83,241,174,227,232,156,148,60,153,3,
  956:           175,128,115,192,36,103,191,239,58,222,192,172,190,239,92,8,131,
  957:           195,0,217,187,222,143,104,6,86,53,93,27,218,198,205,138,223,202,
  958:           11,55,168,104,6,219,228,217,157,37,52,205,252,165,135,167,116,
  959:           216,172,231,222,189,84,97,0,8,106,108,88,47,114,48,116,0,0,0,0,
  960:           100,0,9,116,105,109,101,115,116,97,109,112,98,93,205,0,44>>,
  961: 
  962:     %% Send dummy session ticket to trigger sending of pre_shared_key and
  963:     %% psk_key_exchange_modes extensions.
  964:     Client =
  965:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  966:                                    {host, Hostname},
  967:                                    {from, self()},
  968:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  969:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
  970:                                                                        {session_tickets, manual},
  971:                                                                        {use_ticket, [DummyTicket]},
  972:                                                                        {versions, ['tlsv1.3',
  973:                                                                                    'tlsv1.2',
  974:                                                                                    'tlsv1.1',
  975:                                                                                    'tlsv1'
  976:                                                                                   ]},
  977:                                                                        {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3')},
  978:                                                                        {verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts
  979:                                                                       ],
  980:                                                                       Config)},
  981:                                    {continue_options,  proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ClientOpts)}]),
  982: 
  983:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  984: 
  985:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  986:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).

  988: %%------------------------------------------------------------------
  989: handshake_continue_timeout() ->
  990:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue/3 with short timeout"}].
  991: handshake_continue_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  992:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  993:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  994:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  995: 
  996:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  997:                                         {from, self()},
  998:                                         {timeout, 1},
  999:                                         {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{reuseaddr, true}, {handshake, hello},
 1000:                                                                             {verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts],
 1001:                                                                            Config)},
 1002:                                         {continue_options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}
 1003:                                        ]),
 1004: 
 1005:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1006: 
 1007: 
 1008:     ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1009:                                      {host, Hostname},
 1010:                                      {from, self()},
 1011:                                      {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1012:     
 1013:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, {error,timeout}),
 1014:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
 1015: 
 1016: handshake_continue_change_verify() ->
 1017:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_continue with updated verify option. "
 1018:       "Use a verification that will fail to make sure verification is run"}].
 1019: handshake_continue_change_verify(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1020:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1021:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1022:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1023: 
 1024:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(
 1025:                [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1026:                 {from, self()},
 1027:                 {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(
 1028:                             [{handshake, hello},
 1029:                              {verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts], Config)},
 1030:                 {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ServerOpts)}]),
 1031: 
 1032:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1033: 
 1034:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error(
 1035:                [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1036:                 {host, Hostname},
 1037:                 {from, self()},
 1038:                 {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(
 1039:                             [{handshake, hello},
 1040:                              {server_name_indication, "foobar"},
 1041:                              {verify, verify_none}
 1042:                             | ClientOpts], Config)},
 1043:                 {continue_options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1044:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client,  handshake_failure).
 1045: 
 1046: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1047: hello_client_cancel() ->
 1048:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_cancel/1 on the client side"}].
 1049: hello_client_cancel(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1050:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1051:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1052:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1053: 
 1054:     Server =
 1055:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1056:                                    {host, Hostname},
 1057:                                    {from, self()},
 1058:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
 1059:                                                                        {verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts], Config)},
 1060:                                    {continue_options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1061:     
 1062:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1063: 
 1064:     %% That is ssl:handshake_cancel returns ok
 1065:     {connect_failed, ok} =
 1066:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1067:                                    {host, Hostname},
 1068:                                    {from, self()},
 1069:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello}
 1070:                                                                       | ClientOpts], Config)},
 1071:                                    {continue_options, cancel}]),
 1072:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, user_canceled).
 1073: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1074: hello_server_cancel() ->
 1075:     [{doc, "Test API function ssl:handshake_cancel/1 on the server side"}].
 1076: hello_server_cancel(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1077:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1078:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1079:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1080: 
 1081:     Server =
 1082:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1083:                                    {from, self()},
 1084:                                    {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
 1085:                                                                        {verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts
 1086:                                                                       ], Config)},
 1087:                                    {continue_options, cancel}]),
 1088:     
 1089:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1090: 
 1091:     ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1092:                                      {host, Hostname},
 1093:                                      {from, self()}, 
 1094:                                      {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{handshake, hello},
 1095:                                                                          {verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts
 1096:                                                                         ], Config)},
 1097:                                      {continue_options, proplists:delete(reuseaddr, ClientOpts)}]),
 1098:     
 1099:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok).
 1100: 
 1101: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1102: versions() ->
 1103:     [{doc,"Test API function versions/0"}].
 1104: 
 1105: versions(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1106:     [_|_] = Versions = ssl:versions(),
 1107:     ?CT_LOG("~p~n", [Versions]).
 1108: 
 1109: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1110: 
 1111: versions_option_based_on_sni() ->
 1112:     [{doc,"Test that SNI versions option is selected over default versions"}].
 1113: 
 1114: versions_option_based_on_sni(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1115:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1116:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1117:     TestVersion = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 1118:     {Version, Versions} = test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni(TestVersion),
 1119:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1120: 
 1121:     SNI = net_adm:localhost(),
 1122:     Fun = fun(ServerName) ->
 1123:               case ServerName of
 1124:                   SNI ->
 1125:                       [{versions, [Version]} | ServerOpts];
 1126:                   _ ->
 1127:                       ServerOpts
 1128:               end
 1129:           end,
 1130: 
 1131:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1132: 					{from, self()},
 1133: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, protocol_version_check, [Version]}},
 1134: 					{options, [{sni_fun, Fun},
 1135:                                                    {versions, Versions} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1136:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1137:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1138: 					{host, Hostname},
 1139: 					{from, self()},
 1140: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1141: 					{options, [{server_name_indication, SNI}, {versions, Versions} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1142: 
 1143:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
 1144:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1145:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1146: 
 1147: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1148: %% Test case adapted from gen_tcp_misc_SUITE.
 1149: active_n() ->
 1150:     [{doc,"Test {active,N} option"}].
 1151: 
 1152: active_n(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1153:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1154:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1155:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(node()),
 1156:     Host = net_adm:localhost(),
 1157:     N = 3,
 1158:     LS = ok(ssl:listen(Port, [{active,N}|ServerOpts])),
 1159:     [{active,N}] = ok(ssl:getopts(LS, [active])),
 1160:     active_n_common(LS, N),
 1161:     Self = self(),
 1162:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 1163:         S0 = ok(ssl:transport_accept(LS)),
 1164:         {ok, S} = ssl:handshake(S0),
 1165:         ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 1166:         [{active,N}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 1167:         ssl:controlling_process(S, Self),
 1168:         Self ! {server, S}
 1169:     end),
 1170:     C = ok(ssl:connect(Host, Port, [{active,N}|ClientOpts])),
 1171:     [{active,N}] = ok(ssl:getopts(C, [active])),
 1172:     S = receive
 1173:         {server, S0} -> S0
 1174:     after
 1175:         1000 ->
 1176:             exit({error, connect})
 1177:     end,
 1178:     active_n_common(C, N),
 1179:     active_n_common(S, N),
 1180:     ok = ssl:setopts(C, [{active,N}]),
 1181:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 1182:     ReceiveMsg = fun(Socket, Msg) ->
 1183:         receive
 1184:             {ssl,Socket,Msg} ->
 1185:                 ok;
 1186:             {ssl,Socket,Begin} ->
 1187:                 receive
 1188:                     {ssl,Socket,End} ->
 1189:                         Msg = Begin ++ End,
 1190:                         ok
 1191:                 after 1000 ->
 1192:                     exit(timeout)
 1193:                 end
 1194:         after 1000 ->
 1195:             exit(timeout)
 1196:         end
 1197:     end,
 1198:     repeat(3, fun(I) ->
 1199:         Msg = "message "++integer_to_list(I),
 1200:         ok = ssl:send(C, Msg),
 1201:         ReceiveMsg(S, Msg),
 1202:         ok = ssl:send(S, Msg),
 1203:         ReceiveMsg(C, Msg)
 1204:     end),
 1205:     receive
 1206:         {ssl_passive,S} ->
 1207:             [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active]))
 1208:     after
 1209:         1000 ->
 1210:             exit({error,ssl_passive})
 1211:     end,
 1212:     receive
 1213:         {ssl_passive,C} ->
 1214:             [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(C, [active]))
 1215:     after
 1216:         1000 ->
 1217:             exit({error,ssl_passive})
 1218:     end,
 1219:     LS2 = ok(ssl:listen(0, [{active,0}])),
 1220:     receive
 1221:         {ssl_passive,LS2} ->
 1222:             [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(LS2, [active]))
 1223:     after
 1224:         1000 ->
 1225:             exit({error,ssl_passive})
 1226:     end,
 1227:     ok = ssl:close(LS2),
 1228:     ok = ssl:close(C),
 1229:     ok = ssl:close(S),
 1230:     ok = ssl:close(LS),
 1231:     ok.
 1232: 
 1233: hibernate_client() ->
 1234:     [{doc,"Check that an SSL connection on client side that is started with "
 1235:       "option hibernate_after indeed hibernates after inactivity"}].
 1236: 
 1237: hibernate_client(Config) ->
 1238:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1239:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1240:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1241:     StartServerOpts = [return_socket, {node, ServerNode},
 1242:                        {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 1243:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 1244:                        {options, [{hibernate_after, infinity} | ServerOpts]}],
 1245:     StartClientOpts = [return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {host, Hostname},
 1246:                        {from, self()},
 1247:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}}],
 1248:     [ok = hibernate_helper(?config(version, Config), false,
 1249:                            StartServerOpts, StartClientOpts,
 1250:                            ServerOpts, ClientOpts, T, infinity) ||
 1251:         T <- [1000, 0, 1]].
 1252: 
 1253: hibernate_server() ->
 1254:     [{doc,"Check that an SSL connection on server side that is started with "
 1255:       "option hibernate_after indeed hibernates after inactivity."
 1256:       "Note: for DTLS test will not be stable, because cookie secret refresh "
 1257:       "mechanism might disturb hibernation of a server process."}].
 1258: hibernate_server(Config) ->
 1259:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1260:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1261:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1262:     StartServerOpts = [return_socket, {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1263:                        {from, self()},
 1264:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}}],
 1265:     StartClientOpts = [return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {host, Hostname},
 1266:                        {from, self()},
 1267:                        {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}}],
 1268:     [ok = hibernate_helper(?config(version, Config), true,
 1269:                            StartServerOpts, StartClientOpts,
 1270:                            ServerOpts, ClientOpts, infinity, T) ||
 1271:         T <- [1000, 0, 1]].
 1272: 
 1273: hibernate_helper(Version, CheckServer, StartServerOpts, StartClientOpts,
 1274:                  ServerOpts0, ClientOpts0,
 1275:                  ClientHibernateAfter, ServerHibernateAfter) ->
 1276:     AllServerOpts = StartServerOpts ++
 1277:         [{options, [{hibernate_after, ServerHibernateAfter} | ServerOpts0]}],
 1278:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(AllServerOpts),
 1279:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1280:     AllClientOpts = StartClientOpts ++
 1281:         [{port, Port},
 1282:          {options, [{hibernate_after, ClientHibernateAfter} | ClientOpts0]}],
 1283:     {Client, #sslsocket{pid = [ClientReceiverPid | ClientPotentialSenderPid]}} =
 1284:         ssl_test_lib:start_client(AllClientOpts),
 1285:     Results = ssl_test_lib:get_result([Client, Server]),
 1286:     {ok, ServerAcceptSocket} = proplists:get_value(Server, Results),
 1287:     ok = proplists:get_value(Client, Results),
 1288:     #sslsocket{pid = [ServerReceiverPid | ServerPotentialSenderPid]} =
 1289:         ServerAcceptSocket,
 1290:     {ReceiverPid, PotentialSenderPid, HibernateAfter} =
 1291:         case CheckServer of
 1292:             true -> {ServerReceiverPid, ServerPotentialSenderPid,
 1293:                      ServerHibernateAfter};
 1294:             false -> {ClientReceiverPid, ClientPotentialSenderPid,
 1295:                       ClientHibernateAfter}
 1296:         end,
 1297:     SleepAmount = max(1.5*HibernateAfter, 500),
 1298:     ?CT_LOG("HibernateAfter = ~w SleepAmount = ~w", [HibernateAfter, SleepAmount]),
 1299:     ct:sleep(SleepAmount), %% Schedule out
 1300:     {current_function, {erlang, hibernate, 3}} =
 1301: 	process_info(ReceiverPid, current_function),
 1302:     IsTls = ssl_test_lib:is_tls_version(Version),
 1303:     case IsTls of
 1304:         true ->
 1305:             [SenderPid] = PotentialSenderPid,
 1306:             {current_function, {erlang, hibernate, 3}} =
 1307:                 process_info(SenderPid, current_function);
 1308:         _ -> %% DTLS (no sender process)
 1309:             ok
 1310:     end,
 1311:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1312:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
 1313:     ok.
 1314: 
 1315: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1316: listen_socket() ->
 1317:     [{doc,"Check error handling and inet compliance when calling API functions with listen sockets."}].
 1318: 
 1319: listen_socket(Config) ->
 1320:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1321:     {ok, ListenSocket} = ssl:listen(0, ServerOpts),
 1322:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, ServerOpts, tls),
 1323:     %% This can be a valid thing to do as
 1324:     %% options are inherited by the accept socket
 1325:     ok = ssl:controlling_process(ListenSocket, self()),
 1326: 
 1327:     {ok, _} = ssl:sockname(ListenSocket),
 1328: 
 1329:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:send(ListenSocket, <<"data">>),
 1330:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:recv(ListenSocket, 0),
 1331:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:connection_information(ListenSocket),
 1332:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:peername(ListenSocket),
 1333:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:peercert(ListenSocket),
 1334:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:renegotiate(ListenSocket),
 1335:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:export_key_materials(ListenSocket, [<<"Label">>], [<<"Context">>], 256),
 1336:     %% Legacy test
 1337:     {error, enotconn} = ssl:prf(ListenSocket, master_secret,
 1338:                                 <<"Label">>, [client_random, server_random], 256),
 1339:     case Protocol of
 1340:         tls ->
 1341:             {error, enotconn} = ssl:shutdown(ListenSocket, read_write);
 1342:         dtls ->
 1343:             {error, notsup} = ssl:shutdown(ListenSocket, read_write)
 1344:     end,
 1345:     ok = ssl:close(ListenSocket).
 1346: 
 1347: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1348: peername() ->
 1349:     [{doc,"Test API function peername/1"}].
 1350: 
 1351: peername(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1352:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1353:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1354:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1355: 
 1356:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(
 1357:                [
 1358:                 {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1359:                 {from, self()},
 1360:                 {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1361:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1362:     {Client, CSocket} = ssl_test_lib:start_client(
 1363:                           [return_socket,
 1364:                            {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1365:                            {host, Hostname},
 1366:                            {from, self()},
 1367:                            {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1368: 
 1369:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1370: 
 1371:     Server ! get_socket,
 1372:     SSocket =
 1373:         receive
 1374:             {Server, {socket, Socket}} ->
 1375:                 Socket
 1376:         end,
 1377: 
 1378:     {ok, ServerPeer} = ssl:peername(SSocket),
 1379:     ?CT_LOG("Server's peer: ~p~n", [ServerPeer]),
 1380:     {ok, ClientPeer} = ssl:peername(CSocket),
 1381:     ?CT_LOG("Client's peer: ~p~n", [ClientPeer]),
 1382: 
 1383:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1384:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1385: 
 1386: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1387:

 1465: recv_timeout() ->
 1466:     [{doc,"Test ssl:recv timeout"}].
 1467: 
 1468: recv_timeout(Config) ->
 1469:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1470:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1471: 
 1472:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1473: 
 1474:     Server =
 1475: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1476: 				   {from, self()},
 1477: 				   {mfa, {?MODULE, send_recv_result_timeout_server, []}},
 1478: 				   {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1479:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1480: 
 1481:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1482: 					{host, Hostname},
 1483: 					{from, self()},
 1484: 					{mfa, {?MODULE,
 1485: 					       send_recv_result_timeout_client, []}},
 1486: 					{options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1487: 
 1488:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, ok, Server, ok),
 1489:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1490:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1491: 
 1492: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1493: recv_close() ->
 1494:     [{doc,"Special case of call error handling"}].
 1495: recv_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1496:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1497:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1498: 
 1499:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1500:     Server  = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1501: 					  {from, self()},
 1502: 					  {mfa, {?MODULE, do_recv_close, []}},
 1503: 					 {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1504:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1505:     {_Client, #sslsocket{} = SslSocket} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
 1506: 									   {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1507: 									   {host, Hostname},
 1508: 									   {from, self()},
 1509: 									   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1510: 									   {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1511:     ssl:close(SslSocket),
 1512:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok).
 1513: 
 1514: 
 1515: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1516: recv_no_active_msg() ->
 1517:     [{doc,"If we have a passive socket and do not call recv and peer closes we should no get"
 1518:       "receive an active message"}].
 1519: recv_no_active_msg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1520:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1521:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1522: 
 1523:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1524:     Server  = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1525: 					  {from, self()},
 1526: 					  {mfa, {?MODULE, no_recv_no_active, []}},
 1527: 					 {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1528:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1529:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1530:                                         {host, Hostname},
 1531:                                         {from, self()},
 1532:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1533:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1534:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
 1535:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok).
 1536: 
 1537: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1538: controlling_process() ->
 1539:     [{doc,"Test API function controlling_process/2"}].
 1540: 
 1541: controlling_process(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1542:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1543:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1544:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1545:     ClientMsg = "Server hello",
 1546:     ServerMsg = "Client hello",
 1547:    
 1548:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([
 1549:                                         {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1550:                                         {from, self()}, 
 1551:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1552:                                                controlling_process_result, [self(),
 1553:                                                                             ServerMsg]}},
 1554:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1555:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1556:     {Client, CSocket} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
 1557:                                                    {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1558:                                                    {host, Hostname},
 1559:                                         {from, self()}, 
 1560: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1561: 				  controlling_process_result, [self(),
 1562: 							       ClientMsg]}},
 1563: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1564:     
 1565:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1566:     
 1567:     ServerMsg = ssl_test_lib:active_recv(CSocket, length(ServerMsg)),
 1568:     %% We do not have the TLS server socket but all messages form the client
 1569:     %% socket are now read, so ramining are form the server socket
 1570:     ClientMsg = ssl_active_recv(length(ClientMsg)),
 1571: 
 1572:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1573:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 1574: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1575: controller_dies() ->
 1576:     [{doc,"Test that the socket is closed after controlling process dies"}].
 1577: controller_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1578:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1579:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1580:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1581:     ClientMsg = "Hello server",
 1582:     ServerMsg = "Hello client",
 1583: 
 1584:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1585: 					{from, self()}, 
 1586: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1587: 					       controller_dies_result, [self(),
 1588: 									ServerMsg]}},
 1589: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
 1590:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1591:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1592: 					{host, Hostname},
 1593: 					{from, self()}, 
 1594: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1595: 					       controller_dies_result, [self(),
 1596: 									    ClientMsg]}},
 1597: 					{options, ClientOpts}]),
 1598: 
 1599:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1600:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP), %% so that they are connected
 1601:     
 1602:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1603: 
 1604:     %% Test that clients die
 1605:     exit(Client, killed),
 1606:     get_close(Client, ?LINE),
 1607: 
 1608:     %% Test that clients die when process disappear
 1609:     Server ! listen, 
 1610:     Tester = self(),
 1611:     Connect = fun(Pid) ->
 1612: 		      {ok, Socket} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
 1613: 		      %% Make sure server finishes and verification
 1614: 		      %% and is in coonection state before
 1615: 		      %% killing client
 1616: 		      ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
 1617: 		      Pid ! {self(), connected, Socket},
 1618: 		      receive die_nice -> normal end
 1619: 	      end,
 1620:     Client2 = spawn_link(fun() -> Connect(Tester) end),
 1621:     receive {Client2, connected, _Socket} ->  Client2 ! die_nice end,
 1622:     
 1623:     get_close(Client2, ?LINE),
 1624:     
 1625:     %% Test that clients die when the controlling process have changed 
 1626:     Server ! listen, 
 1627: 
 1628:     Client3 = spawn_link(fun() -> Connect(Tester) end),
 1629:     Controller = spawn_link(fun() -> receive die_nice -> normal end end),
 1630:     receive 
 1631: 	{Client3, connected, Socket} ->  
 1632: 	    ok = ssl:controlling_process(Socket, Controller),
 1633: 	    Client3 ! die_nice 
 1634:     end,
 1635: 
 1636:     ?CT_LOG("Waiting on exit ~p~n",[Client3]),
 1637:     receive {'EXIT', Client3, normal} -> ok end,
 1638:     
 1639:     receive   %% Client3 is dead but that doesn't matter, socket should not be closed.
 1640: 	Unexpected ->
 1641: 	    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 1642: 	    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 1643:     after 1000 ->
 1644: 	    ok
 1645:     end,
 1646:     Controller ! die_nice,
 1647:     get_close(Controller, ?LINE),
 1648:     
 1649:     %% Test that servers die
 1650:     Server ! listen, 
 1651:     LastClient = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 1652: 					    {host, Hostname},
 1653: 					    {from, self()}, 
 1654: 					    {mfa, {?MODULE, 
 1655: 						   controller_dies_result, [self(),
 1656: 									    ClientMsg]}},
 1657: 					    {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1658:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP), %% so that they are connected
 1659:     
 1660:     exit(Server, killed),
 1661:     get_close(Server, ?LINE),
 1662:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
 1663:     ssl_test_lib:close(LastClient).
 1664: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1665: controlling_process_transport_accept_socket() ->
 1666:     [{doc,"Only ssl:handshake and ssl:controlling_process is allowed for transport_accept:sockets"}].
 1667: controlling_process_transport_accept_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1668:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1669:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1670:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1671: 
 1672:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_transport_control([{node, ServerNode}, 
 1673:                                                           {port, 0},
 1674:                                                           {from, self()},
 1675:                                                           {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1676:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1677:     
 1678:     _Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1679:                                               {host, Hostname},
 1680:                                               {from, self()},
 1681:                                               {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1682:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
 1683:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server).
 1684: 
 1685: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1686: close_with_timeout() ->
 1687:       [{doc,"Test normal (not downgrade) ssl:close/2"}].
 1688: close_with_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1689:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1690:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1691:     
 1692:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1693: 
 1694:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1695: 					{from, self()},
 1696: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, tls_close, []}},
 1697: 					{options,[{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1698:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1699:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1700: 					{host, Hostname},
 1701: 					{from, self()},
 1702: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, tls_close, []}},
 1703: 					{options, [{active, false} |ClientOpts]}]),
 1704: 
 1705:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 1706: 
 1707: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1708: close_in_error_state() ->
 1709:     [{doc,"Special case of closing socket in error state"}].
 1710: close_in_error_state(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1711:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_opts, Config),
 1712:     ServerOpts = [{cacertfile, "foo.pem"} | proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerOpts0)],
 1713:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
 1714:     _ = spawn(?MODULE, run_error_server_close, [[self() | ServerOpts]]),
 1715:     receive
 1716:         {_Pid, Port} ->
 1717:             spawn_link(?MODULE, run_client_error, [[Port, [{verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts]]])
 1718:     end,
 1719:     receive
 1720:         ok ->
 1721:             ok;
 1722:         Other ->
 1723:             ct:fail(Other)
 1724:     end.
 1725: 
 1726: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1727: call_in_error_state() ->
 1728:     [{doc,"Special case of call error handling"}].
 1729: call_in_error_state(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1730:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_opts, Config),
 1731:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
 1732:     ServerOpts = [{cacertfile, "foo.pem"} | proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerOpts0)],
 1733:     Pid = spawn(?MODULE, run_error_server, [[self() | ServerOpts]]),
 1734:     receive
 1735:         {Pid, Port} ->
 1736:             spawn_link(?MODULE, run_client_error, [[Port, [{verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts]]])
 1737:     end,
 1738:     receive
 1739:         {error, closed} ->
 1740:             ok;
 1741:         Other ->
 1742:             ct:fail(Other)
 1743:     end.
 1744: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1745: close_transport_accept() ->
 1746:     [{doc,"Tests closing ssl socket when waiting on ssl:transport_accept/1"}].
 1747: 
 1748: close_transport_accept(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1749:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1750:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, _Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1751: 
 1752:     Port = 0,
 1753:     Opts = [{active, false} | ServerOpts],
 1754:     {ok, ListenSocket} = rpc:call(ServerNode, ssl, listen, [Port, Opts]),
 1755:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 1756: 			ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
 1757: 			rpc:call(ServerNode, ssl, close, [ListenSocket])
 1758: 	       end),
 1759:     case rpc:call(ServerNode, ssl, transport_accept, [ListenSocket]) of
 1760: 	{error, closed} ->
 1761: 	    ok;
 1762: 	Other ->
 1763: 	    exit({?LINE, Other})
 1764:     end.
 1765: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------

 1771:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1772: 
 1773:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_transport_abuse_socket([{node, ServerNode}, 
 1774:                                                                {port, 0},
 1775:                                                                {from, self()},
 1776:                                                                {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1777:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1778:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1779:                                         {host, Hostname},
 1780:                                         {from, self()},
 1781:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
 1782:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),

 1784:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1785:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
