 1789: invalid_keyfile() ->
 1790:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid key file"}].
 1791: invalid_keyfile(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1792:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1793:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1794:     BadKeyFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 1795: 			      "badkey.pem"]),
 1796:     BadOpts = [{keyfile, BadKeyFile}| proplists:delete(keyfile, ServerOpts)],
 1797:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1798: 
 1799:     Server = 
 1800: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1801: 					 {from, self()},
 1802: 			    {options, BadOpts}]),
 1803: 
 1804:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1805: 
 1806:     Client =
 1807: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 1808: 			    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 1809: 			    {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1810: 
 1811:     File = proplists:get_value(keyfile,BadOpts),    
 1812:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server,
 1813:                               {error,{options, {keyfile, File, {error,enoent}}}}, Client,
 1814:                               {error, closed}).
 1815: 
 1816: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1817: honor_server_cipher_order() ->
 1818:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order."}].
 1819: honor_server_cipher_order(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1820:      ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => dhe_rsa, 
 1821:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc, 
 1822:                        mac => sha,
 1823:                        prf => default_prf}, 
 1824:                      #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa, 
 1825:                        cipher => aes_256_cbc, 
 1826:                        mac => sha,
 1827:                        prf => default_prf}],
 1828:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => dhe_rsa, 
 1829:                        cipher => aes_256_cbc,   
 1830:                        mac =>sha,
 1831:                        prf => default_prf},
 1832:                      #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa, 
 1833:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc, 
 1834:                        mac => sha,
 1835:                        prf => default_prf}],
 1836:     honor_cipher_order(Config, true, ServerCiphers,
 1837:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1838:                                         cipher => aes_256_cbc,
 1839:                                         mac => sha,
 1840:                                         prf => default_prf}).
 1841: 
 1842: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1843: honor_client_cipher_order() ->
 1844:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order."}].
 1845: honor_client_cipher_order(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1846:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => dhe_rsa, 
 1847:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc, 
 1848:                        mac => sha,
 1849:                        prf => default_prf}, 
 1850:                      #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa, 
 1851:                        cipher => aes_256_cbc, 
 1852:                        mac => sha,
 1853:                        prf => default_prf}],
 1854:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => dhe_rsa, 
 1855:                        cipher => aes_256_cbc,   
 1856:                        mac =>sha,
 1857:                        prf => default_prf},
 1858:                      #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa, 
 1859:                        cipher => aes_128_cbc, 
 1860:                        mac => sha,
 1861:                        prf => default_prf}],
 1862:     honor_cipher_order(Config, false, ServerCiphers,
 1863:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => dhe_rsa,
 1864:                                         cipher => aes_128_cbc,
 1865:                                         mac => sha,
 1866:                                         prf => default_prf}).
 1867: 
 1868: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1869: ipv6() ->
 1870:     [{require, ipv6_hosts},
 1871:      {doc,"Test ipv6."}].
 1872: ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1873:     {ok, Hostname0} = inet:gethostname(),
 1874:     
 1875:     case lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname0), ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts)) of
 1876: 	true ->
 1877: 	    ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1878: 	    ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1879: 	    {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = 
 1880: 		ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config, ipv6),
 1881: 	    Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, 
 1882: 				   {port, 0}, {from, self()}, 
 1883: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 1884: 				   {options,  
 1885: 				    [inet6, {active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1886: 	    Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server), 
 1887: 	    Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, 
 1888: 				   {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 1889: 				   {from, self()}, 
 1890: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 1891: 				   {options, 
 1892: 				    [inet6, {active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1893: 	    
 1894: 	    ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 1895: 	    
 1896: 	    ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 1897: 	    
 1898: 	    ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1899: 	    ssl_test_lib:close(Client);
 1900: 	false ->
 1901: 	    {skip, "Host does not support IPv6"}
 1902:     end.
 1903: 
 1904: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1905: der_input() ->
 1906:     [{doc,"Test to input certs and key as der"}].
 1907: 
 1908: der_input(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1909:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1910:     DHParamFile = filename:join(DataDir, "dHParam.pem"),
 1911: 
 1912:     {status, _, _, StatusInfo} = sys:get_status(whereis(ssl_manager)),
 1913:     [_, _,_, _, Prop] = StatusInfo,
 1914:     State = ssl_test_lib:state(Prop),
 1915:     [CADb | _] = element(5, State),
 1916:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP*2), %%Make sure there is no outstanding clean cert db msg in manager
 1917:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 1918:     ?CT_LOG("Size ~p", [Size]),
 1919: 
 1920:     SeverVerifyOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1921:     {ServerCert, ServerKey, ServerCaCerts, DHParams} = der_input_opts([{dhfile, DHParamFile} |
 1922: 								       SeverVerifyOpts]),
 1923:     ClientVerifyOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1924:     {ClientCert, ClientKey, ClientCaCerts, DHParams} = der_input_opts([{dhfile, DHParamFile} |
 1925: 								       ClientVerifyOpts]),
 1926:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 1927: 		  {dh, DHParams},
 1928: 		  {cert, ServerCert}, {key, ServerKey}, {cacerts, ServerCaCerts}],
 1929:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1930: 		  {cert, ClientCert}, {key, ClientKey}, {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}],
 1931:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1932:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1933: 					{from, self()},
 1934: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 1935: 					{options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
 1936:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1937:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 1938: 					{host, Hostname},
 1939: 					{from, self()},
 1940: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 1941: 					{options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 1942: 
 1943:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 1944:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 1945:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client),
 1946:     %% Using only DER input should not increase file indexed DB 
 1947:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 1948: 
 1949:     ServerOpts1 = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 1950:                    {dh, DHParams},
 1951:                    {cert, ServerCert}, {key, ServerKey},
 1952:                    {cacerts, [ #cert{der=Der, otp=public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Der, otp)}
 1953:                                || Der <- ServerCaCerts]}],
 1954:     ClientOpts1 = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1955:                    {cert, ClientCert}, {key, ClientKey},
 1956:                    {cacerts, [ #cert{der=Der, otp=public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Der, otp)}
 1957:                                || Der <- ClientCaCerts]}],
 1958:     Server1 = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1959:                                          {from, self()},
 1960:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 1961:                                          {options, [{active, false} | ServerOpts1]}]),
 1962:     Port1 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server1),
 1963:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port1},
 1964:                                          {host, Hostname},
 1965:                                          {from, self()},
 1966:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
 1967:                                          {options, [{active, false} | ClientOpts1]}]),
 1968: 
 1969:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server1, ok, Client1, ok),
 1970:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server1),
 1971:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
 1972:     %% Using only DER input should not increase file indexed DB 
 1973:     Size = ets:info(CADb, size),
 1974: 
 1975:     ok.
 1976: 
 1977: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1978: invalid_certfile() ->
 1979:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid cert file"}].
 1980: 
 1981: invalid_certfile(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1982:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1983:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 1984:     BadCertFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 1985:                                  "badcert.pem"]),
 1986:     ServerBadOpts = [{certfile, BadCertFile}| proplists:delete(certfile, ServerOpts)],
 1987:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1988: 
 1989: 
 1990:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1991:     
 1992:     Server = 
 1993: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 1994: 					 {from, self()},
 1995: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts}]),
 1996: 
 1997:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 1998: 
 1999:     Client =
 2000: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2001: 					 {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
 2002: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2003: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2004:     File = proplists:get_value(certfile, ServerBadOpts),
 2005:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, {error,{options, {certfile, File, {error,enoent}}}}, 
 2006: 			      Client, {error, closed}).
 2007:     
 2008: 
 2009: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2010: invalid_cacertfile() ->
 2011:     [{doc,"Test what happens with an invalid cacert file"}].
 2012: 
 2013: invalid_cacertfile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2014:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2015:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2016:     BadCACertFile = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 2017:                                  "badcacert.pem"]),
 2018:     ServerBadOpts = [{cacertfile, BadCACertFile}| proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerOpts)],
 2019:     
 2020:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2021: 
 2022:     Server0  = 
 2023: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, 
 2024: 					 {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 2025: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts}]),
 2026: 
 2027:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
 2028:     
 2029: 
 2030:     Client0 =
 2031: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2032: 					 {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 2033: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2034: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2035: 
 2036:     File0 = proplists:get_value(cacertfile, ServerBadOpts),
 2037:     
 2038:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, {error, {options, {cacertfile, File0,{error,enoent}}}},
 2039: 			      Client0, {error, closed}),
 2040:     
 2041:     File = File0 ++ "do_not_exit.pem",
 2042:     ServerBadOpts1 = [{cacertfile, File}|proplists:delete(cacertfile, ServerBadOpts)],
 2043:             
 2044:     Server1  = 
 2045: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, 
 2046: 					 {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 2047: 					 {options, ServerBadOpts1}]),
 2048: 
 2049:     Port1 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server1),
 2050:     
 2051:     Client1 =
 2052: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, 
 2053: 					 {port, Port1}, {host, Hostname},
 2054: 					 {from, self()}, 
 2055: 					 {options, ClientOpts}]),
 2056: 
 2057: 
 2058:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server1, {error, {options, {cacertfile, File,{error,enoent}}}},
 2059: 			      Client1, {error, closed}),
 2060:     ok.
 2061: 
 2062: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2063: new_options_in_handshake() ->
 2064:     [{doc,"Test that you can set ssl options in handshake/3 and not only in tcp upgrade"}].
 2065: new_options_in_handshake(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2066:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2067:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2068:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 2069:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2070: 
 2071:     Ciphers = [_, Cipher | _] = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, Version), 
 2072:                                                          [{key_exchange,
 2073:                                                  fun(dhe_rsa) ->
 2074:                                                          true;
 2075:                                                     (ecdhe_rsa) ->
 2076:                                                          true;
 2077:                                                     (rsa) ->
 2078:                                                          false;
 2079:                                                     (_) ->
 2080:                                                          false
 2081:                                                  end
 2082:                                                 }]),
 2083:     
 2084:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 2085: 					{from, self()}, 
 2086: 					{ssl_extra_opts, [{versions, [Version]},
 2087: 							  {ciphers,[Cipher]}]}, %% To be set in handshake/3
 2088: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 2089: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
 2090:     
 2091:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2092:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 2093: 					{host, Hostname},
 2094: 					{from, self()}, 
 2095: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 2096: 					{options, [{ciphers, Ciphers} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2097:     
 2098:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 2099: 
 2100:     ServerMsg = ClientMsg = {ok, {Version, Cipher}},
 2101:    
 2102:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
 2103:     
 2104:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 2105:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 2106: 
 2107: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 2108: max_handshake_size() ->
 2109:     [{doc,"Test that we can set max_handshake_size to max value."}].
 2110: 
 2111: max_handshake_size(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2112:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2113:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),  
 2114: 
 2115:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2116:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
 2117: 					{from, self()}, 
 2118: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 2119: 					{options,  [{max_handshake_size, 8388607} |ServerOpts]}]),
 2120:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 2121:     
 2122:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
 2123: 					{host, Hostname},
 2124: 					{from, self()}, 
 2125: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 2126: 					{options, [{max_handshake_size, 8388607} | ClientOpts]}]),
 2127:  
 2128:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 2129:   
 2130: 
 2131: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 2132: options_not_proplist() ->
 2133:     [{doc,"Test what happens if an option is not a key value tuple"}].
 2134: 
 2135: options_not_proplist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2136:     BadOption =  {client_preferred_next_protocols, 
 2137: 		  client, [<<"spdy/3">>,<<"http/1.1">>], <<"http/1.1">>},
 2138:     {error, {options, {option_not_a_key_value_tuple, BadOption}}} =
 2139: 	ssl:connect("twitter.com", 443, [binary, {active, false}, 
 2140: 					 BadOption]).
 2141: 
 2142: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 2143: invalid_options() ->
 2144:     [{doc,"Test what happens when we give invalid options"}].
 2145:        
 2146: invalid_options(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 2147:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 2148:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 2149:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 2150:     
 2151:     Check = fun(Client, Server, {versions, [sslv2, sslv3]} = Option) ->
 2152: 		    ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, 
 2153: 					      {error, {options, {sslv2, Option}}}, 
 2154: 					      Client,
 2155: 					      {error, {options, {sslv2, Option}}});
 2156: 	       (Client, Server, Option) ->
 2157: 		    ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, 
 2158: 					      {error, {options, Option}}, 
 2159: 					      Client,
 2160: 					      {error, {options, Option}})
 2161: 	    end,
 2162: 
 2163:     TestOpts = 
 2164:          [{versions, [sslv2, sslv3]}, 
 2165:           {verify_fun, function},
 2166:           {fail_if_no_peer_cert, 0}, 
 2167:           {depth, four}, 
 2168:           {certfile, 'cert.pem'}, 
 2169:           {keyfile,'key.pem' }, 
 2170:           {password, foo},
 2171:           {cacertfile, ""}, 
 2172:           {ciphers, [{foo, bar, sha, ignore}]},
 2173:           {reuse_session, foo},
 2174:           {reuse_sessions, 0},
 2175:           {renegotiate_at, "10"},
 2176:           {mode, depech},
 2177:           {packet, 8.0},
 2178:           {packet_size, "2"},
 2179:           {header, a},
 2180:           {active, trice},
 2181:           {key, 'key.pem' }],
 2182: 
 2183:     TestOpts2 =
 2184:         [{[{supported_groups, []}, {versions, [tlsv1]}],
 2185:           {options,incompatible,[supported_groups,{versions,['tlsv1']}]}}],
 2186: 
 2187:     [begin
 2188: 	 Server =
 2189: 	     ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 2190: 					{from, self()},
 2191: 					{options, ServerOpts ++ [TestOpt]}]),
 2192: 	 %% Will never reach a point where port is used.
 2193: 	 Client =
 2194: 	     ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
 2195: 					      {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 2196: 					      {options, ClientOpts ++ [TestOpt]}]),
 2197: 	 Check(Client, Server, TestOpt),
 2198: 	 ok
 2199:      end || TestOpt <- TestOpts],
 2200: 
 2201:     [begin
 2202:          start_client_negative(Config, TestOpt, ErrorMsg),
 2203:          ok
 2204:      end || {TestOpt, ErrorMsg} <- TestOpts2],
 2205:     ok.
 2206: 
 2207: options_whitebox() ->
 2208:     [{doc,"Whitebox tests of option handling"}].
 2209: 
 2210: 
 2211: customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host) ->
 2212:     %% In many options test scenarios we do not care about verifcation options
 2213:     %% but the client now requiers verification options by default.
 2214:     ClientIgnorDef = case proplists:get_value(verify, Opts, undefined) of
 2215:                          undefined when Role == client ->
 2216:                              [{verify, verify_none}];
 2217:                          _ ->
 2218:                              []
 2219:                      end,
 2220:     case proplists:get_value(protocol, Opts, tls) of
 2221:         dtls ->
 2222:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl:handle_options([{verify, verify_none}, {protocol, dtls}], Role, Host),
 2223:             {DOpts, ClientIgnorDef ++ Opts};
 2224:         tls ->
 2225:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl:handle_options([{verify, verify_none}], Role, Host),
 2226:             case proplists:get_value(versions, Opts) of
 2227:                 undefined ->
 2228:                     {DOpts, ClientIgnorDef ++ [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|Opts]};
 2229:                 _ ->
 2230:                     {DOpts, ClientIgnorDef ++ Opts}
 2231:             end;
 2232:         _ ->
 2233:             {ok, #config{ssl=DOpts}} = ssl:handle_options(ClientIgnorDef, Role, Host),
 2234:             {DOpts, ClientIgnorDef ++ Opts}
 2235:     end.
 2236: 
 2237: -define(OK(EXP, Opts, Role), ?OK(EXP,Opts, Role, [])).
 2238: -define(OK(EXP, Opts, Role, ShouldBeMissing),
 2239:         fun() ->
 2240:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2241:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2242:                 try ssl:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2243:                     {ok, #config{ssl=EXP = __ALL}} ->
 2244:                         ShouldBeMissing = ShouldBeMissing -- maps:keys(__ALL);
 2245:                     Other ->
 2246:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2247:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2248:                 catch
 2249:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2250:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2251:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2252:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2253:                 end,
 2254:                 try ssl:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2255:                     EXP = __ALL2 ->
 2256:                         ShouldBeMissing = ShouldBeMissing -- maps:keys(__ALL2);
 2257:                     Other2 ->
 2258:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2259:                                "ssl:update_options(~w,~w, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2260:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2261:                         error({unexpected2, Other2})
 2262:                 catch
 2263:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2264:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2265:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2266:                                "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2267:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2268:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2, ST2})
 2269:                 end
 2270:         end()).
 2271: 
 2272: -define(ERR(EXP, Opts, Role),
 2273:         fun() ->
 2274:                 Host = "dummy.host.org",
 2275:                 {__DefOpts, __Opts} = customize_defaults(Opts, Role, Host),
 2276:                 try ssl:handle_options(__Opts, Role, Host) of
 2277:                     Other ->
 2278:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2279:                         error({unexpected, Other})
 2280:                 catch
 2281:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2282:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2283:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2284:                     C:Other:ST ->
 2285:                         ?CT_PAL("ssl:handle_options(~0p,~0p,~0p).",[__Opts,Role,Host]),
 2286:                         error({unexpected, C, Other,ST})
 2287:                 end,
 2288:                 try ssl:update_options(__Opts, Role, __DefOpts) of
 2289:                     Other2 ->
 2290:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2291:                                "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2292:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2293:                         error({unexpected, Other2})
 2294:                 catch
 2295:                     throw:{error,{options,{insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3',_}}}} -> ignored;
 2296:                     throw:{error, {options, EXP}} -> ok;
 2297:                     throw:{error, EXP} -> ok;
 2298:                     C2:Other2:ST2 ->
 2299:                         ?CT_PAL("{ok,Cfg} = ssl:handle_options([],~p,~p),"
 2300:                                "ssl:update_options(~p,~p, element(2,Cfg)).",
 2301:                                [Role,Host,__Opts,Role]),
 2302:                         error({unexpected, C2, Other2,ST2})
 2303:                 end
 2304:         end()).
 2305: 
 2306: options_whitebox(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2307:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2308:     true = is_binary(Cert),
 2309:     ?OK(#{verify := verify_peer},  %% Check Option order last wins
 2310:         [{verify, verify_none}, {verify,verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], client),
 2311:     options_protocol(Config),
 2312:     options_version(Config),
 2313:     options_alpn(Config),
 2314:     options_anti_replay(Config),
 2315:     options_beast_mitigation(Config),
 2316:     options_cacerts(Config),
 2317:     options_cert(Config),
 2318:     options_certificate_authorities(Config),
 2319:     options_ciphers(Config),
 2320:     options_client_renegotiation(Config),
 2321:     options_cookie(Config),
 2322:     options_crl(Config),
 2323:     options_hostname_check(Config),
 2324:     options_dh(Config),
 2325:     options_early_data(Config),
 2326:     options_eccs(Config),
 2327:     options_verify(Config),
 2328:     options_fallback(Config),
 2329:     options_handshake(Config),
 2330:     options_process(Config),
 2331:     options_honor(Config),
 2332:     options_debug(Config),
 2333:     options_renegotiate(Config),
 2334:     options_middlebox(Config),
 2335:     options_frag_len(Config),
 2336:     options_oscp(Config),
 2337:     options_padding(Config),
 2338:     options_identity(Config),
 2339:     options_reuse_session(Config),
 2340:     options_sni(Config),
 2341:     options_sign_alg(Config),
 2342:     options_supported_groups(Config),
 2343:     options_use_srtp(Config),
 2344:     ok.
 2345: 
 2346: options_protocol(_Config) ->
 2347:     ?OK(#{protocol := tls},  [], client),
 2348:     ?OK(#{protocol := tls},  [{protocol, tls}], client),
 2349:     ?OK(#{protocol := dtls}, [{protocol, dtls}], client),
 2350: 
 2351:     %% Errors
 2352:     ?ERR({protocol, foo}, [{protocol, 'foo'}], client),
 2353: 
 2354:     begin %% erl_dist
 2355:         ?OK(#{}, [], client, [erl_dist]),
 2356:         ?OK(#{}, [{erl_dist, false}], client, [erl_dist]),
 2357:         ?OK(#{erl_dist := true}, [{erl_dist, true}], client),
 2358:         ?OK(#{}, [], client, [ktls]),
 2359:         ?OK(#{}, [{ktls, false}], client, [ktls]),
 2360:         ?OK(#{ktls := true}, [{ktls, true}], client)
 2361:     end,
 2362:     ok.
 2363: 
 2364: options_version(_Config) ->
 2365:     ?OK(#{versions := [_|_]}, [], client),  %% Hmm some machines still default only ?TLS_1_2
 2366:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2]}, [{protocol, dtls}], client),
 2367: 
 2368:     ?OK(#{versions := [?TLS_1_3,?TLS_1_2,?TLS_1_1,?TLS_1_0]},
 2369:         [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1','tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}],
 2370:         client),
 2371:     ?OK(#{versions := [?TLS_1_3]}, [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], client),
 2372: 
 2373:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2,?DTLS_1_0]},
 2374:         [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1', 'dtlsv1.2']}],  client),
 2375:     ?OK(#{versions := [?DTLS_1_2]}, [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1.2']}], client),
 2376: 
 2377: 
 2378:     %% Errors
 2379:     ?ERR({versions, []}, [{versions, []}], client),
 2380:     ?ERR({versions, []}, [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, []}], client),
 2381: 
 2382:     ?ERR({'tlsv1.4',{versions, ['tlsv1.4']}},
 2383:          [{versions, ['tlsv1.4']}], client),
 2384:     ?ERR({'dtlsv1', {versions, _}},
 2385:          [{versions, ['dtlsv1', 'dtlsv1.2']}], client),
 2386: 
 2387:     ?ERR({'tlsv1', {versions, _}},
 2388:          [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1','tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}],
 2389:          client),
 2390:     ?ERR({'dtlsv1.3',{versions, ['dtlsv1.3']}},
 2391:          [{protocol, dtls}, {versions, ['dtlsv1.3']}],
 2392:          client),
 2393:     ?ERR({options,missing_version,{'tlsv1.2',_}},
 2394:          [{versions, ['tlsv1.1','tlsv1.3']}],
 2395:          client),
 2396:     ok.
 2397: 
 2398: options_alpn(_Config) -> %% alpn & next_protocols
 2399:     Http = <<"HTTP/2">>,
 2400:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := undefined}, [], client,
 2401:         [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2402:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := undefined},  [], server,
 2403:         [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2404: 
 2405:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := [Http]}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http]}],
 2406:         server, [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2407:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := [Http]}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [Http]}],
 2408:         client, [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocol_selector, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2409: 
 2410:     %% Note names have been swapped in client/server variants
 2411: 
 2412:     ?OK(#{alpn_preferred_protocols := undefined, next_protocols_advertised := [Http]},
 2413:         [{next_protocols_advertised, [Http]}], server, [alpn_advertised_protocols, next_protocol_selector]),
 2414:     ?OK(#{alpn_advertised_protocols := undefined, next_protocol_selector := _},
 2415:         [{client_preferred_next_protocols, {server,[Http], Http}}],
 2416:         client, [alpn_preferred_protocols, next_protocols_advertised]),
 2417: 
 2418:     %% Errors
 2419:     ?ERR({alpn_preferred_protocols, {invalid_protocol, <<>>}}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http, <<>>]}], server),
 2420:     ?ERR({alpn_advertised_protocols, Http}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, Http}], client),
 2421:     ?ERR({alpn_preferred_protocols, undefined}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, undefined}], server),
 2422:     ?ERR({alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}], client),
 2423:     ?ERR({option, server_only, alpn_preferred_protocols}, [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [Http]}], client),
 2424:     ?ERR({option, client_only, alpn_advertised_protocols}, [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [Http]}], server),
 2425:     ?ERR({option, server_only, next_protocols_advertised}, [{next_protocols_advertised, [Http]}], client),
 2426:     ?ERR({option, client_only, client_preferred_next_protocols}, [{client_preferred_next_protocols, [Http]}], server),
 2427:     ok.
 2428: 
 2429: options_anti_replay(_Config) ->
 2430:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := undefined}, [], server),
 2431:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2432:         [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2433:         server),
 2434:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2435:         [{anti_replay, {42,4711,21}}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2436:         server),
 2437:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2438:         [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2439:         server),
 2440:     ?OK(#{anti_replay := {_,_,_}},
 2441:         [{anti_replay, {42,4711,21}}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2442:         server),
 2443: 
 2444: 
 2445:     %% Errors
 2446:     ?ERR({option, server_only, anti_replay},
 2447:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, manual}],
 2448:          client),
 2449:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{anti_replay, _}, {session_tickets, disabled}]},
 2450:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}],
 2451:          server),
 2452:     ?ERR({options,incompatible, [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1']}]},
 2453:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}, {versions, ['tlsv1']}],
 2454:          server),
 2455:     ?ERR({anti_replay, '1k'},
 2456:          [{anti_replay, '1k'}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2457:          server),
 2458:     ?ERR({anti_replay, _},
 2459:          [{anti_replay, {1,1,1,1}}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2460:          server),
 2461:     ?ERR({options,incompatible, [session_tickets,{versions,['tlsv1']}]},
 2462:          [{anti_replay, '10k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}, {versions, ['tlsv1']}],
 2463:          server),
 2464:     ?ERR({anti_replay, '1k'},
 2465:          [{anti_replay, '1k'}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2466:          server),
 2467:     ?ERR({anti_replay, _},
 2468:          [{anti_replay, {1,1,1,1}}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2469:          server),
 2470:     ok.
 2471: 
 2472: options_beast_mitigation(_Config) -> %% Beast mitigation TLS-1.0 option only
 2473:     ?OK(#{beast_mitigation := one_n_minus_one}, [{versions, [tlsv1,'tlsv1.1']}], client),
 2474:     ?OK(#{}, [{versions, ['tlsv1.1']}], client, [beast_mitigation]),
 2475:     ?OK(#{}, [{beast_mitigation, disabled}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client,
 2476:         [beast_mitigation]),
 2477:     ?OK(#{beast_mitigation := zero_n},
 2478:         [{beast_mitigation, zero_n}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client),
 2479: 
 2480:     %% Errors
 2481:     ?ERR({beast_mitigation, enabled},
 2482:          [{beast_mitigation, enabled}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], client),
 2483:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [beast_mitigation, {versions, _}]},
 2484:          [{beast_mitigation, disabled}], client),
 2485:     ok.
 2486: 
 2487: options_cacerts(Config) ->  %% cacert[s]file
 2488:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2489:     File = case os:type() of
 2490:                {win32, _} -> <<"c:/tmp/foo">>;
 2491:                _ -> <<"/tmp/foo">>
 2492:            end,
 2493:     ?OK(#{cacerts := undefined}, [], client, [cacertfile]),
 2494:     ?OK(#{cacerts := undefined, cacertfile := File},
 2495:         [{cacertfile, File}], client),
 2496:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [Cert]}, [{cacerts, [Cert]}, {verify, verify_peer}],
 2497:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2498:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [#cert{}]}, [{cacerts, [#cert{der=Cert, otp=dummy}]}],
 2499:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2500:     ?OK(#{cacerts := [Cert]}, [{cacerts, [Cert]}, {cacertfile, "/tmp/foo"}],
 2501:         client, [cacertfile]),
 2502: 
 2503:     %% Errors
 2504:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _}, [{verify, verify_peer}], server),
 2505:     ?ERR({cacerts, Cert}, [{cacerts, Cert}], client),
 2506:     ?ERR({cacertfile, cert}, [{cacertfile, cert}], client),
 2507: 
 2508:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [depth]),
 2509:     ?OK(#{depth := 5}, [{depth, 5}], client),
 2510:     %% Error
 2511:     ?ERR({depth, 256}, [{depth, 256}], client),
 2512:     ?ERR({depth, not_an_int}, [{depth, not_an_int}], client),
 2513:     ok.
 2514: 
 2515: options_cert(Config) -> %% cert[file] cert_keys keys password
 2516:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2517:     Old = [cert, certfile, key, keyfile, password],
 2518:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := []}, [], client, Old),
 2519:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{cert := [Cert]}]}, [{cert,Cert}], client, Old),
 2520:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{cert := [Cert]}]}, [{cert,[Cert]}], client, Old),
 2521:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{certfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>, keyfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>}]},
 2522:         [{certfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}], client, Old),
 2523: 
 2524:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{}]}, [{certs_keys, [#{}]}], client),
 2525: 
 2526:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := {rsa, <<>>}}]},
 2527:         [{key, {rsa, <<>>}}], client, Old),
 2528:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{key := #{}}]},
 2529:         [{key, #{engine => foo, algorithm => foo, key_id => foo}}], client, Old),
 2530: 
 2531:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := _}]}, [{password, "foobar"}], client, Old),
 2532:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := _}]}, [{password, <<"foobar">>}], client, Old),
 2533:     Pwd = fun() -> "foobar" end,
 2534:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{password := Pwd}]}, [{password, Pwd}], client, Old),
 2535: 
 2536:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{certfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>, keyfile := <<"/tmp/baz">>}]},
 2537:         [{certfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}, {keyfile, "/tmp/baz"}], client, Old),
 2538: 
 2539:     ?OK(#{certs_keys := [#{}]},
 2540:         [{cert, Cert}, {certfile, "/tmp/foo"}, {certs_keys, [#{}]}],
 2541:         client, Old),
 2542: 
 2543:     %% Errors
 2544:     ?ERR({cert, #{}}, [{cert, #{}}], client),
 2545:     ?ERR({certfile, cert}, [{certfile, cert}], client),
 2546:     ?ERR({certs_keys, #{}}, [{certs_keys, #{}}], client),
 2547:     ?ERR({keyfile, #{}}, [{keyfile, #{}}], client),
 2548:     ?ERR({key, <<>>}, [{key, <<>>}], client),
 2549:     ?ERR({password, _}, [{password, fun(Arg) -> Arg end}], client),
 2550:     ok.
 2551:

 2556:     ?OK(#{}, [{certificate_authorities, false}], client, [certificate_authorities]),
 2557:     ?OK(#{certificate_authorities := false}, [{certificate_authorities, false}], server),
 2558:     ?OK(#{}, [{certificate_authorities, true}], server, [certificate_authorities]),
 2559: 
 2560:     %% Errors
 2561:     ?ERR({certificate_authorities, []},
 2562:          [{certificate_authorities,  []}], client),
 2563:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [certificate_authorities, {versions, _}]},
 2564:          [{certificate_authorities, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}],
 2565:          client),
 2566:     ok.

 2574:

 2625: options_dh(_Config) -> %% dh dhfile
 2626:     ?OK(#{}, [], server, [dh, dhfile]),

 2629:     ?OK(#{dh := <<>>}, [{dh, <<>>}, {dhfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}], server, [dhfile]),
 2630: 
 2631:     %% Should be an error
 2632:     ?OK(#{dhfile := <<"/tmp/foo">>},  %% Not available in 1.3
 2633:         [{dhfile, <<"/tmp/foo">>}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], server, [dh]),
 2634: 
 2635:     %% Error
 2636:     ?ERR({dh, not_a_bin}, [{dh, not_a_bin}], server),
 2637:     ?ERR({dhfile, not_a_filename}, [{dhfile, not_a_filename}], server),
 2638:     ?ERR({option, server_only, dhfile}, [{dhfile, "file"}], client),
 2639:     ?ERR({option, server_only, dh}, [{dh, <<"DER">>}], client),
 2640:     ok.

 2642: options_early_data(_Config) -> %% early_data, session_tickets and use_ticket
 2643:     ?OK(#{early_data := undefined, session_tickets := disabled},
 2644:         [], client),
 2645:     ?OK(#{early_data := disabled, session_tickets := disabled, stateless_tickets_seed := undefined},
 2646:         [], server),
 2647: 
 2648:     ?OK(#{early_data := <<>>, session_tickets := auto},
 2649:         [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, auto}], client),
 2650:     ?OK(#{early_data := <<>>, session_tickets := manual, use_ticket := [<<1>>]},
 2651:         [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, manual}, {use_ticket, [<<1>>]}],
 2652:         client),
 2653: 
 2654:     ?OK(#{early_data := enabled, stateless_tickets_seed := <<"foo">>},
 2655:         [{early_data, enabled}, {session_tickets, stateless}, {stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}], server),
 2656:     ?OK(#{early_data := enabled, stateless_tickets_seed := <<"foo">>},
 2657:         [{early_data, enabled}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}, {stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}], server),
 2658: 
 2659:     ?OK(#{early_data := disabled}, [{early_data, disabled}], server),
 2660: 
 2661:     %% Errors
 2662:     ?ERR({option, client_only, use_ticket}, [{use_ticket, []}], server),
 2663:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _}, [{use_ticket, [<<>>]}], client),
 2664: 
 2665:     ?ERR({options, {session_tickets, foo}}, [{session_tickets, foo}], server),
 2666:     ?ERR({options, {session_tickets, manual}}, [{session_tickets, manual}], server),
 2667:     ?ERR({options, {session_tickets, stateful}}, [{session_tickets, stateful}], client),
 2668:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [session_tickets, {versions, _}]},
 2669:          [{session_tickets, stateful}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], server),
 2670:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [session_tickets, {versions, _}]},
 2671:          [{session_tickets, stateful_with_cert}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], server),
 2672: 
 2673:     ?ERR({use_ticket, foo},
 2674:          [{use_ticket, foo}, {session_tickets, manual}], client),
 2675: 
 2676:     ?ERR({early_data,undefined}, [{early_data, undefined}], client),
 2677:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [early_data, {session_tickets, _}]},
 2678:          [{early_data, <<>>}], client),
 2679:     ?ERR({options, {early_data, enabled}},
 2680:          [{early_data, enabled}, {session_tickets, auto}], client),
 2681:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [early_data, _, {use_ticket, _}]},
 2682:          [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, manual}], client),
 2683: 
 2684:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [early_data, {session_tickets, _}]},
 2685:          [{early_data, enabled}], server),
 2686:     ?ERR({options, {early_data, <<>>}},
 2687:          [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, stateless}], server),
 2688:     ?ERR({options, {early_data, <<>>}},
 2689:          [{early_data, <<>>}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}], server),
 2690: 
 2691:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, stateful}]},
 2692:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}, {session_tickets, stateful}],
 2693:          server),
 2694:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [stateless_tickets_seed, {session_tickets, stateful_with_cert}]},
 2695:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}, {session_tickets, stateful_with_cert}],
 2696:          server),
 2697:     ?ERR({stateless_tickets_seed, foo},
 2698:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, foo}, {session_tickets, stateless}],
 2699:          server),
 2700:     ?ERR({stateless_tickets_seed, foo},
 2701:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, foo}, {session_tickets, stateless_with_cert}],
 2702:          server),
 2703:     ?ERR({option, server_only, stateless_tickets_seed},
 2704:          [{stateless_tickets_seed, <<"foo">>}], client),
 2705:     ok.

 2707: options_eccs(_Config) ->
 2708:     Curves = tl(ssl:eccs()),
 2709:     ?OK(#{eccs := {elliptic_curves, [_|_]}}, [], client),
 2710:     ?OK(#{eccs := {elliptic_curves, [_|_]}}, [{eccs, Curves}], client),
 2711: 
 2712:     %% Errors
 2713:     ?ERR({eccs, not_a_list}, [{eccs, not_a_list}], client),
 2714:     ?ERR({eccs, none_valid}, [{eccs, []}], client),
 2715:     ?ERR({eccs, none_valid}, [{eccs, [foo]}], client),

 2718: options_verify(Config) ->  %% fail_if_no_peer_cert, verify, verify_fun, partial_chain
 2719:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2720:     {ok, #config{ssl = DefOpts = #{verify_fun := {DefVerify,_}}}} = ssl:handle_options([{verify, verify_none}], client, "dummy.host.org"),
 2721: 
 2722:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := false, verify := verify_none, verify_fun := {DefVerify, []}, partial_chain := _},
 2723:         [], server),
 2724:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := undefined, partial_chain := _},
 2725:         [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2726:         server),
 2727:      ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := undefined, partial_chain := _},
 2728:          [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], server),
 2729: 
 2730:     NewF3 = fun(_,_,_) -> ok end,
 2731:     NewF4 = fun(_,_,_,_) -> ok end,
 2732:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [fail_if_no_peer_cert]),
 2733:     ?OK(#{verify := verify_none, verify_fun := {NewF3, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 2734:         [{verify_fun, {NewF3, foo}}], client),
 2735:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := {NewF3, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 2736:         [{verify_fun, {NewF3, foo}}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2737:         server),
 2738:     ?OK(#{fail_if_no_peer_cert := true, verify := verify_peer, verify_fun := {NewF4, foo}, partial_chain := _},
 2739:         [{verify_fun, {NewF4, foo}}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2740:         server),
 2741: 
 2742: 
 2743:     %% check verify_fun in update_options case
 2744:     #{verify_fun := undefined} = ssl:update_options([{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}], client, DefOpts),
 2745:     #{verify_fun := {NewF3, bar}} = ssl:update_options([{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]},
 2746:                                                         {verify_fun, {NewF3, bar}}],
 2747:                                                        client, DefOpts),
 2748: 
 2749:     %% Errors
 2750:     ?ERR({partial_chain, undefined}, [{partial_chain, undefined}], client),
 2751:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, verify_none}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}]},
 2752:          [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}], server),
 2753:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, _}, {cacerts, undefined}]}, [{verify, verify_peer}], client),
 2754:     ?ERR({option, server_only, fail_if_no_peer_cert},
 2755:          [{fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [Cert]}],
 2756:          client),
 2757:     ?ERR({verify, verify}, [{verify, verify}], client),
 2758:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{verify, _}, {cacerts, undefined}]}, [{verify, verify_peer}], server),
 2759:     ?ERR({partial_chain, not_a_fun}, [{partial_chain, not_a_fun}], client),
 2760:     ?ERR({verify_fun, not_a_fun}, [{verify_fun, not_a_fun}], client),
 2761:     ok.
 2762:

 2771:          [{fallback, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], client),
 2772:     ok.

 2787: options_process(_Config) -> % hibernate_after, spawn_opts

 2790:           receiver_spawn_opts := [{fullsweep_after, 500}],
 2791:           sender_spawn_opts := [{fullsweep_after, 500}]},
 2792:         [{hibernate_after, 10000},
 2793:          {receiver_spawn_opts,[{fullsweep_after, 500}]},
 2794:          {sender_spawn_opts, [{fullsweep_after, 500}]}],
 2795:         client),
 2796:     %% Errors
 2797:     ?ERR({hibernate_after, -1}, [{hibernate_after, -1}], server),
 2798:     ?ERR({receiver_spawn_opts, not_a_list}, [{receiver_spawn_opts, not_a_list}], server),
 2799:     ?ERR({sender_spawn_opts, not_a_list}, [{sender_spawn_opts, not_a_list}], server),
 2800:     ok.

 2816: options_debug(_Config) -> %% debug  log_level keep_secrets
 2817:     ?OK(#{log_level := notice}, [], server, [keep_secrets]),
 2818:     ?OK(#{log_level := debug, keep_secrets := true},
 2819:         [{log_level, debug}, {keep_secrets, true}], server),
 2820:     ?OK(#{log_level := info},
 2821:         [{log_level, info}, {keep_secrets, false}], server, [keep_secrets]),
 2822: 
 2823:     %% Errors
 2824:     ?ERR({log_level, foo}, [{log_level, foo}], server),
 2825:     ?ERR({keep_secrets, foo}, [{keep_secrets, foo}], server),
 2826:     ok.
 2827: 
 2828: options_renegotiate(_Config) -> %% key_update_at   renegotiate_at  secure_renegotiate
 2829:     ?OK(#{key_update_at := ?KEY_USAGE_LIMIT_AES_GCM, renegotiate_at := 268435456, secure_renegotiate := true},
 2830:         [], server),
 2831:     ?OK(#{key_update_at := 123456, renegotiate_at := 64000, secure_renegotiate := false},
 2832:         [{key_update_at, 123456}, {renegotiate_at, 64000}, {secure_renegotiate, false}],
 2833:         server),
 2834: 
 2835:     %% Errors
 2836:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [key_update_at, {versions, _}]},
 2837:          [{key_update_at, 123456}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], server),
 2838:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [secure_renegotiate, {versions, _}]},
 2839:          [{secure_renegotiate, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}], server),
 2840: 
 2841:     ?ERR({key_update_at, -1}, [{key_update_at, -1}], server),
 2842:     ?ERR({renegotiate_at, not_a_int}, [{renegotiate_at, not_a_int}], server),
 2843:     ?ERR({renegotiate_at, -1}, [{renegotiate_at, -1}], server),
 2844:     ok.
 2845: 
 2846: options_middlebox(_Config) -> %% middlebox_comp_mode
 2847:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, [middlebox_comp_mode]),
 2848:     ?OK(#{}, [{middlebox_comp_mode, true}], client, [middlebox_comp_mode]),
 2849:     ?OK(#{middlebox_comp_mode := false}, [{middlebox_comp_mode, false}], client),
 2850: 
 2851:     %% Errors
 2852:     ?ERR({middlebox_comp_mode, foo}, [{middlebox_comp_mode, foo}], server),
 2853:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [middlebox_comp_mode, {versions, _}]},
 2854:          [{middlebox_comp_mode, false}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']}], server),
 2855:     ok.
 2856: 
 2857: options_frag_len(_Config) -> %% max_fragment_length
 2858:     ?OK(#{max_fragment_length := undefined}, [], client),
 2859:     ?OK(#{max_fragment_length := 2048}, [{max_fragment_length, 2048}], client),
 2860: 
 2861:     %% Errors
 2862:     ?ERR({option, client_only, max_fragment_length},
 2863:          [{max_fragment_length, 2048}], server),
 2864:     ?ERR({max_fragment_length,2000}, [{max_fragment_length, 2000}], client),
 2865:     ok.

 2867: options_oscp(Config) ->
 2868:     Cert = proplists:get_value(
 2869:              cert, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_der_opts, Config)),
 2870:     NoOcspOption = [ocsp_stapling, ocsp_nonce, ocsp_responder_certs],
 2871: 
 2872:     ?OK(#{}, [], client, NoOcspOption),
 2873:     ?OK(#{}, [{ocsp_stapling, false}], client, NoOcspOption),
 2874:     ?OK(#{ocsp_stapling := #{ocsp_nonce := true, ocsp_responder_certs := []}},
 2875:         [{ocsp_stapling, true}], client, [ocsp_nonce, ocsp_responder_certs]),
 2876:     ?OK(#{ocsp_stapling :=
 2877:               #{ocsp_nonce := false, ocsp_responder_certs := [_, _]}},
 2878:         [{ocsp_stapling, true}, {ocsp_nonce, false},
 2879:          {ocsp_responder_certs, [Cert,Cert]}],
 2880:         client, [ocsp_nonce, ocsp_responder_certs]),
 2881:     %% Errors
 2882:     ?ERR({ocsp_stapling, foo}, [{ocsp_stapling, 'foo'}], client),
 2883:     ?ERR({ocsp_nonce, foo}, [{ocsp_nonce, 'foo'}], client),
 2884:     ?ERR({ocsp_responder_certs, foo}, [{ocsp_responder_certs, 'foo'}], client),
 2885:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [{ocsp_nonce, false}, {ocsp_stapling, false}]},
 2886:          [{ocsp_nonce, false}], client),
 2887:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [ocsp_responder_certs, {ocsp_stapling, false}]},
 2888:          [{ocsp_responder_certs, [Cert]}], server),
 2889:     ?ERR({ocsp_responder_certs, [_]},
 2890:          [{ocsp_stapling, true}, {ocsp_responder_certs, ['NOT A BINARY']}],
 2891:          client),
 2892:     ok.
 2893: 
 2894: options_padding(_Config) ->
 2895:     ?OK(#{}, [], server, [padding_check]),
 2896:     ?OK(#{padding_check := false}, [{padding_check, false}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], server),
 2897:     %% Errors
 2898:     ?ERR({padding_check, foo}, [{padding_check, foo}, {versions, [tlsv1]}], server),
 2899:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [padding_check, {versions, ['tlsv1.3','tlsv1.2']}]},
 2900:          [{padding_check, false}], server),
 2901:     ok.
 2902: 
 2903: options_identity(_Config) ->  %% psk_identity  srp_identity and user_lookup_fun
 2904:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := undefined, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 2905:         [], client),
 2906:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := <<"foobar">>, srp_identity := undefined, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 2907:         [{psk_identity, "foobar"}], server),
 2908:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := {<<"user">>, <<"pwd">>}, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 2909:         [{srp_identity, {"user", "pwd"}}], client),
 2910:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := undefined, user_lookup_fun := {_, args}},
 2911:         [{user_lookup_fun, {fun(_,_,_) -> ok end, args}}], client),
 2912: 
 2913:     %% Should fail client option only
 2914:     ?OK(#{psk_identity := undefined, srp_identity := {<<"user">>, <<"pwd">>}, user_lookup_fun := undefined},
 2915:         [{srp_identity, {"user", "pwd"}}], server),
 2916: 
 2917:     %% Errors
 2918:     ?ERR({srp_identity, {_,_}},  %% FIXME doesn't like binary strings
 2919:          [{srp_identity, {<<"user">>, <<"pwd">>}}], client),
 2920:     ?ERR({psk_identity, _},  %% FIXME doesn't like binary strings
 2921:          [{psk_identity, <<"user">>}], client),
 2922:     ?ERR({srp_identity, _}, [{srp_identity, "user"}], client),
 2923:     ?ERR({user_lookup_fun, _},
 2924:          [{user_lookup_fun, {fun(_,_) -> ok end, args}}],
 2925:          client),
 2926: 
 2927:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [psk_identity, _]},
 2928:          [{psk_identity, "foobar"},{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 2929:          server),
 2930:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [srp_identity, _]},
 2931:          [{srp_identity, {"user", "pwd"}},{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 2932:          client),
 2933:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [user_lookup_fun, _]},
 2934:          [{user_lookup_fun, {fun(_,_,_) -> ok end, args}}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 2935:          client),
 2936:     ok.
 2937: 
 2938: options_reuse_session(_Config) ->
 2939:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := undefined, reuse_sessions := true}, [], client),
 2940:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := _, reuse_sessions := true}, [], server),
 2941: 
 2942:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := <<>>, reuse_sessions := save},
 2943:         [{reuse_session, <<>>}, {reuse_sessions, save}], client),
 2944:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := {<<>>, <<>>}, reuse_sessions := false},
 2945:         [{reuse_session, {<<>>, <<>>}}, {reuse_sessions, false}], client),
 2946: 
 2947:     RS_F = fun(_,_,_,_) -> ok end,
 2948:     ?OK(#{reuse_session := RS_F, reuse_sessions := false},
 2949:         [{reuse_session, RS_F}, {reuse_sessions, false}],
 2950:         server),
 2951: 
 2952:     %% Errors
 2953:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [reuse_session, _]},
 2954:          [{reuse_session, RS_F}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 2955:          server),
 2956:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [reuse_sessions, _]},
 2957:          [{reuse_sessions, true}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 2958:          server),
 2959:     ?ERR({reuse_session, RS_F},
 2960:          [{reuse_session, RS_F},{reuse_sessions, false}],
 2961:          client),
 2962:     ?ERR({reuse_sessions, foo},  [{reuse_sessions, foo}], server),
 2963:     ?ERR({reuse_session, foo},  [{reuse_session, foo}], server),
 2964:     ?ERR({reuse_sessions, save}, [{reuse_sessions, save}], server),
 2965:     ?ERR({reuse_session, <<>>}, [{reuse_session, <<>>}], server),
 2966: 
 2967:     ok.
 2968: 
 2969: options_sni(_Config) -> %% server_name_indication
 2970:     ?OK(#{server_name_indication := "dummy.host.org"}, [], client),
 2971:     ?OK(#{}, [], server, [server_name_indication]),
 2972:     ?OK(#{server_name_indication := disable}, [{server_name_indication, disable}], client),
 2973:     ?OK(#{server_name_indication := "dummy.org"}, [{server_name_indication, "dummy.org"}], client),
 2974: 
 2975:     ?OK(#{sni_fun := _}, [], server, [sni_hosts]),
 2976: 
 2977:     ?OK(#{sni_fun := _}, [{sni_hosts, [{"a", []}]}], server, [sni_hosts]),
 2978:     SNI_F = fun(_) -> sni end,
 2979:     ?OK(#{sni_fun := SNI_F}, [{sni_fun, SNI_F}], server, [sni_hosts]),
 2980: 
 2981:     %% Errors
 2982:     ?ERR({option, client_only, server_name_indication},
 2983:          [{server_name_indication, "dummy.org"}], server),
 2984:     ?ERR({option, server_only, sni_hosts},  [{sni_hosts, [{"a", []}]}], client),
 2985:     ?ERR({option, server_only, sni_fun},  [{sni_fun, SNI_F}], client),
 2986: 
 2987:     ?ERR({server_name_indication, foo},  [{server_name_indication, foo}], client),
 2988:     ?ERR({sni_hosts, foo}, [{sni_hosts, foo}], server),
 2989:     ?ERR({sni_fun, foo}, [{sni_fun, foo}], server),
 2990: 
 2991:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [sni_fun, sni_hosts]},
 2992:          [{sni_fun, SNI_F}, {sni_hosts, [{"a", []}]}], server),
 2993:     ok.
 2994: 
 2995: options_sign_alg(_Config) ->  %% signature_algs[_cert]
 2996:     ?OK(#{signature_algs := [_|_], signature_algs_cert := undefined},
 2997:         [], client),
 2998:     ?OK(#{signature_algs := [rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,{sha512,rsa}], signature_algs_cert := undefined},
 2999:         [{signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,{sha512,rsa}]}], client),
 3000:     ?OK(#{signature_algs := [_|_], signature_algs_cert := [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]},
 3001:         [{signature_algs_cert, [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]}],
 3002:         client),
 3003: 
 3004:     %% Errors
 3005:     ?ERR({signature_algs, not_a_list}, [{signature_algs, not_a_list}], client),
 3006:     ?ERR({signature_algs_cert, not_a_list}, [{signature_algs_cert, not_a_list}], client),
 3007:     ?ERR({signature_algs, [foobar]}, [{signature_algs, [foobar]}], client),
 3008:     ?ERR({signature_algs_cert, [foobar]}, [{signature_algs_cert, [foobar]}], client),
 3009:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [signature_algs_cert, {versions, _}]},
 3010:          [{signature_algs_cert, [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]}, {versions, ['tlsv1.1']}],
 3011:          client),
 3012:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, [signature_algs_cert, {versions, _}]},
 3013:          [{signature_algs_cert, [eddsa_ed25519, rsa_pss_rsae_sha512]}, {versions, ['tlsv1.1']}],
 3014:          server),
 3015:     ?ERR({options, {no_supported_algorithms, {signature_algs,[]}}},
 3016:          [{signature_algs, []}], client),
 3017:     ?ERR({options, {no_supported_signature_schemes, {signature_algs_cert,[]}}},
 3018:          [{signature_algs_cert, []}],
 3019:          client),
 3020:     ok.
 3021: 
 3022: options_supported_groups(_Config) ->
 3023:     Default = ssl:groups(default),
 3024:     ?OK(#{supported_groups := {supported_groups, Default}},
 3025:         [], client),
 3026:     ?OK(#{supported_groups := {supported_groups, [secp521r1, ffdhe2048]}},
 3027:         [{supported_groups, [secp521r1, ffdhe2048]}], client),
 3028: 
 3029:     %% ERRORs
 3030:     ?ERR({{'tlvs1.2'},{versions,[{'tlvs1.2'}]}},
 3031:          [{supported_groups, []}, {versions, [{'tlvs1.2'}]}], client),
 3032:     ?ERR({supported_groups, not_a_list}, [{supported_groups, not_a_list}], client),
 3033:     ?ERR({supported_groups, none_valid},  [{supported_groups, []}], client),
 3034:     ?ERR({supported_groups, none_valid},  [{supported_groups, [foo]}], client),
 3035:     ok.
 3036: 
 3037: options_use_srtp(_Config) ->
 3038:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki := <<>>}},
 3039:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3040:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>]}}], client),
 3041:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>], mki := <<>>}},
 3042:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3043:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>]}}], server),
 3044:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki := <<"123">>}},
 3045:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3046:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>], mki => <<"123">>}}], client),
 3047:     ?OK(#{use_srtp := #{protection_profiles := [<<0,2>>], mki := <<"123">>}},
 3048:         [{protocol, dtls},
 3049:          {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>], mki => <<"123">>}}], server),
 3050: 
 3051:     %% invalid parameters
 3052:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {no_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3053:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3054:           {use_srtp, #{}}], client),
 3055:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {no_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3056:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3057:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => []}}], client),
 3058:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {invalid_protection_profiles, _}}},
 3059:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3060:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<"bad">>]}}], client),
 3061:     ?ERR({options, {use_srtp, {unknown_parameters,[whatever]}}},
 3062:          [{protocol, dtls},
 3063:           {use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>], whatever => xxx}}], client),
 3064: 
 3065:     %% use_srtp is DTLS-only extension, by default setting its options should raise an error
 3066:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _},
 3067:          [{use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>, <<0,5>>]}}], client),
 3068:     ?ERR({options, incompatible, _},
 3069:          [{use_srtp, #{protection_profiles => [<<0,2>>]}}], server),
 3070:     ok.
 3071: 
 3072: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3073: 
 3074: default_reject_anonymous()->
 3075:     [{doc,"Test that by default anonymous cipher suites are rejected "}].
 3076: default_reject_anonymous(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3077:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3078:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3079:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3080:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 3081:     TLSVersion = ssl_test_lib:tls_version(Version),
 3082:     
 3083:    [CipherSuite | _] = ssl_test_lib:ecdh_dh_anonymous_suites(TLSVersion),
 3084:     
 3085:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3086: 					      {from, self()},
 3087: 					      {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3088:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3089:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3090:                                               {host, Hostname},
 3091:                                               {from, self()},
 3092:                                               {options,
 3093:                                                [{ciphers,[CipherSuite]} |
 3094:                                                 ClientOpts]}]),
 3095: 
 3096:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, insufficient_security).
 3097: 
 3098: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3099: cb_info() ->
 3100:     [{doc,"Test that we can set cb_info."}].
 3101: 
 3102: cb_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3103:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 3104:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3105:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, Config, tls),
 3106:     CbInfo =
 3107:         case Protocol of
 3108:             tls ->
 3109:                 {cb_info, {gen_tcp, tcp, tcp_closed, tcp_error}};
 3110:             dtls ->
 3111:                 {cb_info, {gen_udp, udp, udp_closed, udp_error}}
 3112:         end,
 3113:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3114:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3115:                                         {from, self()},
 3116:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3117:                                         {options,  [CbInfo | ServerOpts]}]),
 3118:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3119: 
 3120:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3121:                                         {host, Hostname},
 3122:                                         {from, self()},
 3123:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3124:                                         {options, [CbInfo | ClientOpts]}]),
 3125: 
 3126:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3127: 
 3128: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3129: log_alert() ->
 3130:     [{doc,"Test that we can set log_alert and that it translates to correct log_level" 
 3131:       " that has replaced this option"}].
 3132: 
 3133: log_alert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3134:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 3135:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3136: 
 3137:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3138:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3139:                                         {from, self()},
 3140:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3141:                                         {options,  [{log_alert, true} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3142:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3143:     {Client, CSock} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
 3144:                                                  {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3145:                                                  {host, Hostname},
 3146:                                                  {from, self()},
 3147:                                                  {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3148:                                                  {options, [{log_alert, false} | ClientOpts]}]),
 3149:     
 3150:     {ok, [{log_level, none}]} = ssl:connection_information(CSock, [log_level]),
 3151:     
 3152:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3153: 
 3154: 
 3155: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3156: %% Note that these test only test that the options are valid to set. As application data
 3157: %% is a stream you can not test that the send acctually splits it up as when it arrives
 3158: %% again at the user layer it may be concatenated. But COVER can show that the split up
 3159: %% code has been run.
 3160:    
 3161: rizzo_disabled() ->
 3162:      [{doc, "Test original beast mitigation disable option for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3163: 
 3164: rizzo_disabled(Config) ->
 3165:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, disabled} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3166:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, disabled} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3167:     
 3168:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3169: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3170: rizzo_zero_n() ->
 3171:      [{doc, "Test zero_n beast mitigation option (same affect as original disable option) for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3172: 
 3173: rizzo_zero_n(Config) ->
 3174:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, zero_n} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3175:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, zero_n} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3176:     
 3177:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3178: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
 3179: rizzo_one_n_minus_one () ->
 3180:      [{doc, "Test beast_mitigation option one_n_minus_one (same affect as default) for SSL 3.0 and TLS 1.0"}].
 3181: 
 3182: rizzo_one_n_minus_one (Config) ->
 3183:     ClientOpts = [{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one } | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3184:     ServerOpts =  [{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config)],
 3185:     
 3186:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 3187:

 3190: supported_groups() ->
 3191:     [{doc,"Test the supported_groups option in TLS 1.3."}].
 3192: 
 3193: supported_groups(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3194:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3195:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3196: 
 3197:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3198: 
 3199:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3200: 					{from, self()},
 3201:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3202:                                         {options, [{supported_groups, [x448, x25519]} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3203:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3204:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3205: 					{host, Hostname},
 3206:                                         {from, self()},
 3207:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
 3208:                                         {options, [{supported_groups,[x448]} | ClientOpts]}]),
 3209: 
 3210:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 3211: 
 3212:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 3213:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 3214: 
 3215: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3216: honor_client_cipher_order_tls13() ->
 3217:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order in TLS 1.3."}].
 3218: honor_client_cipher_order_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3219:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3220:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3221:                        mac => aead,
 3222:                        prf => sha384},
 3223:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3224:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3225:                        mac => aead,
 3226:                        prf => sha256}],
 3227:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3228:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3229:                        mac => aead,
 3230:                        prf => sha256},
 3231:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3232:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3233:                        mac => aead,
 3234:                        prf => sha384}],
 3235:     honor_cipher_order(Config, false, ServerCiphers, ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => any,
 3236:                                                                       cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3237:                                                                       mac => aead,
 3238:                                                                       prf => sha384}).
 3239:

 3313:                                    {session_tickets, auto},
 3314:                                    {early_data, <<"test">>}],
