 3388: honor_server_cipher_order_tls13() ->
 3389:     [{doc,"Test API honor server cipher order in TLS 1.3."}].
 3390: honor_server_cipher_order_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3391:     ClientCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3392:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3393:                        mac => aead,
 3394:                        prf => sha384},
 3395:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3396:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3397:                        mac => aead,
 3398:                        prf => sha256}],
 3399:     ServerCiphers = [#{key_exchange => any,
 3400:                        cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3401:                        mac => aead,
 3402:                        prf => sha256},
 3403:                      #{key_exchange => any,
 3404:                        cipher => aes_256_gcm,
 3405:                        mac => aead,
 3406:                        prf => sha384}],
 3407:     honor_cipher_order(Config, true, ServerCiphers,
 3408:                        ClientCiphers, #{key_exchange => any,
 3409:                                         cipher => aes_128_gcm,
 3410:                                         mac => aead,
 3411:                                         prf => sha256}).
 3412: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3413: getstat() ->
 3414:     [{doc, "Test that you use ssl:getstat on a TLS socket"}].
 3415: 
 3416: getstat(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
 3417:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3418:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3419:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3420:     
 3421:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(ServerNode),
 3422:     {ok, ListenSocket} = ssl:listen(Port0, [ServerOpts]),
 3423:     {ok, _} = ssl:getstat(ListenSocket),
 3424:     ssl:close(ListenSocket),
 3425: 
 3426:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
 3427: 					{from, self()},
 3428:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_getstat, []}},
 3429:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3430:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3431:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
 3432: 					{host, Hostname},
 3433:                                         {from, self()},
 3434:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_getstat, []}},
 3435:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3436:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
 3437: 
 3438: invalid_options_tls13() ->
 3439:     [{doc, "Test invalid options with TLS 1.3"}].
 3440: invalid_options_tls13(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3441:     TestOpts =
 3442:         [{{beast_mitigation, one_n_minus_one},
 3443:           {options, incompatible,
 3444:            [beast_mitigation,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3445:           common},
 3446: 
 3447:          {{next_protocols_advertised, [<<"http/1.1">>]},
 3448:           {options, incompatible,
 3449:            [next_protocols_advertised, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3450:           server},
 3451: 
 3452:          {{client_preferred_next_protocols,
 3453:            {client, [<<"http/1.1">>]}},
 3454:           {options, incompatible,
 3455:            [client_preferred_next_protocols, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3456:           client},
 3457: 
 3458:          {{client_renegotiation, false},
 3459:           {options, incompatible,
 3460:            [client_renegotiation, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3461:           server
 3462:          },
 3463: 
 3464:          {{cookie, false},
 3465:           {option , server_only, cookie},
 3466:           client
 3467:          },
 3468: 
 3469:          {{padding_check, false},
 3470:           {options, incompatible, [padding_check,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3471:           common},
 3472: 
 3473:          {{psk_identity, "Test-User"},
 3474:           {options, incompatible, [psk_identity,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3475:           common},
 3476: 
 3477:          {{user_lookup_fun,
 3478:            {fun ssl_test_lib:user_lookup/3, <<1,2,3>>}},
 3479:           {options, incompatible, [user_lookup_fun,{versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3480:           common},
 3481: 
 3482:          {{reuse_session, fun(_,_,_,_) -> false end},
 3483:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_session, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3484:           server},
 3485: 
 3486:          {{reuse_session, <<1,2,3,4>>},
 3487:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_session, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3488:           client},
 3489: 
 3490:          {{reuse_sessions, true},
 3491:           {options, incompatible, [reuse_sessions, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3492:           common},
 3493: 
 3494:          {{secure_renegotiate, false},
 3495:           {options, incompatible, [secure_renegotiate, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3496:           common},
 3497: 
 3498:          {{srp_identity, {"user", "passwd"}},
 3499:           {options, incompatible, [srp_identity, {versions,['tlsv1.3']}]},
 3500:           client}
 3501:         ],
 3502: 
 3503:     Fun = fun(Option, ErrorMsg, Type) ->
 3504:                   case Type of
 3505:                       server ->
 3506:                           start_server_negative(Config,
 3507:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3508:                                                 ErrorMsg);
 3509:                       client ->
 3510:                           start_client_negative(Config,
 3511:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3512:                                                 ErrorMsg);
 3513:                       common ->
 3514:                           start_server_negative(Config,
 3515:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3516:                                                 ErrorMsg),
 3517:                           start_client_negative(Config,
 3518:                                                 [Option,{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}],
 3519:                                                 ErrorMsg)
 3520:                   end
 3521:           end,
 3522:     [Fun(Option, ErrorMsg, Type) || {Option, ErrorMsg, Type} <- TestOpts].
 3523: 
 3524: 
 3525: ssl_not_started() ->
 3526:     [{doc, "Test that an error is returned if ssl is not started"}].
 3527: ssl_not_started(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3528:     application:stop(ssl),
 3529:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, Config, tls),
 3530:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
 3531:     Opts = [{verify, verify_none},
 3532:             {versions, [Version]},
 3533:             {protocol, Protocol}],
 3534:     try
 3535:         {error, ssl_not_started} = ssl:connect("localhost", 22, Opts)
 3536:     after
 3537:         ssl:start()
 3538:     end,
 3539:     ok.
 3540: 
 3541: cookie() ->
 3542:     [{doc, "Test cookie extension in TLS 1.3"}].
 3543: cookie(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3544:     cookie_extension(Config, true),
 3545:     cookie_extension(Config, false).
 3546: 
 3547: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3548: check_random_nonce() ->
 3549:     [{doc,"Test random nonce - expecting 32B random for TLS1.3 and 4B UTC "
 3550:       "epoch with 28B random for older version"}].
 3551: check_random_nonce(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3552:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 3553:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 3554:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3555:     N = 10,
 3556:     F = fun (Id) -> establish_connection(Id,ServerNode, ServerOpts,
 3557:                                          ClientNode, ClientOpts,
 3558:                                          Hostname)
 3559:         end,
 3560:     ConnectionPairs = [F(Id) || Id <- lists:seq(1, N)],
 3561:     Randoms = lists:flatten([ssl_test_lib:get_result([Server, Client]) ||
 3562:                                 {Server, Client} <- ConnectionPairs]),
 3563:     Deltas = [abs(FourBytes - SecsSince) ||
 3564:                  {_FromPid,
 3565:                   {_Id, {_, <<FourBytes:32, _/binary>>}, SecsSince}} <- Randoms],
 3566:     MeanDelta = lists:sum(Deltas) div N,
 3567:     case ?config(version, Config) of
 3568:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 3569:             %% 4B "random" expected since TLS1.3
 3570:             RndThreshold   = 10000,
 3571:             true = MeanDelta > RndThreshold;
 3572:         _ ->
 3573:             %% 4 epoch based bytes expected pre TLS1.3
 3574:             EpochThreshold = 10,
 3575:             true = MeanDelta < EpochThreshold
 3576:     end,
 3577:     [begin
 3578:          ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 3579:          ssl_test_lib:close(Client)
 3580:      end || {Server, Client} <- ConnectionPairs].
 3581: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3582: cipher_listing() ->
 3583:     [{doc, "Check that exclusive cipher for possible supported version adds up to all cipher " 
 3584:       "for the max version. Note that TLS-1.3 will contain two distinct sets of ciphers "
 3585:       "one for TLS-1.3 and one pre TLS-1.3"}].
 3586: cipher_listing(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3587:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, tuple),
 3588:     length_exclusive(Version) == length_all(Version).
 3589: 
 3590: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3591: format_error() ->
 3592:     "".
 3593: format_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3594:     Errors = [{error, enotconn},
 3595:               {error, closed},
 3596:               {options, {keyfile, "TestFileName", {error,enoent}}},
 3597:               {options, {certfile, "TestFileName", {error,enoent}}},
 3598:               {options, {cacertfile, "TestFileName",{error,enoent}}},
 3599:               {options, {option_not_a_key_value_tuple, [foo]}},
 3600:               {options, {insufficient_crypto_support,{'tlsv1.3','tlsv1.1'}}},
 3601:               {options, incompatible, [{verify,verify_peer},{cacerts,undefined}]},
 3602:               {options, {protocol, foo}},
 3603:               {option, server_only, alpn_preferred_protocols},
 3604:               {options, {alpn_advertised_protocols, undefined}},
 3605:               {options, missing_version, {'tlsv1.2',{versions, ['tlsv1.1','tlsv1.3']}}},
 3606:               {options, {no_supported_algorithms, {signature_algs,[]}}},
 3607:               {options, {no_supported_signature_schemes, {signature_algs_cert,[]}}}
 3608:              ],
 3609:     Check = fun(Err) ->
 3610:                     Str = ssl:format_error(Err),
 3611:                     io:format("~p => ~s ~n", [Err, Str]),
 3612:                     %% Verify flat string (why do ssl flatten strings?)
 3613:                     Str = [C || C <- Str, is_integer(C)]
 3614:             end,
 3615:     [Check(Err) || Err <- Errors],
 3616:     ok.
 3617: 
 3618: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3619: 
 3620: export_key_materials() ->
 3621:     [{doc, "Test export_key_materials/4,5"}].
 3622: 
 3623: export_key_materials(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3624:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3625:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3626:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3627:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3628:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3629: 
 3630:     Label = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp">>,
 3631: 
 3632:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3633:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3634:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3635:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3636:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3637:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3638:     Server ! get_socket,
 3639:     ServerS = receive
 3640:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3641:               end,
 3642: 
 3643:     case Version of
 3644:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 3645:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [<<>>], [32], false),
 3646:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [<<>>], [32], false),
 3647:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [no_context], [32]),
 3648:             {ok, [ExportKeyMaterial]} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [no_context], [32]);
 3649:         _ ->
 3650:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial1} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [<<>>], [20]),
 3651:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial1} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [<<>>], [20]),
 3652:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial2} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label], [no_context], [20]),
 3653:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterial2} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label], [no_context], [20]),
 3654:             true = ExportKeyMaterial1 =/= ExportKeyMaterial2
 3655:     end.
 3656: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3657: exporter_master_secret_consumed() ->
 3658:     [{doc, "Test export_key_materials/4,5 TLS-1.3 functionality"}].
 3659: 
 3660: exporter_master_secret_consumed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3661:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3662:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3663:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3664:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3665:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3666: 
 3667:     Label1 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp1">>,
 3668:     Label2 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp2">>,
 3669:     Label3 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp3">>,
 3670:     Label4 = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp4">>,
 3671: 
 3672:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3673:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3674:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3675:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3676:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3677:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3678:     Server ! get_socket,
 3679:     ServerS = receive
 3680:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3681:               end,
 3682: 
 3683:     {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label1, Label2], [<<>>, <<>>], [32, 32]),
 3684:     {error, exporter_master_secret_already_consumed} = ssl:export_key_materials(ServerS, [Label3], [<<>>], [32]),
 3685:     {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label1, Label2], [<<>>, <<>>], [32, 32], false),
 3686:     {error, bad_input} = ssl:export_key_materials(ClientS, [Label3, Label4], [<<>>], [32]).
 3687: 
 3688: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3689: 
 3690: legacy_prf() ->
 3691:     [{doc, "Test prf/5"}].
 3692: 
 3693: legacy_prf(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3694:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3695:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3696:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3697:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3698:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3699: 
 3700:    {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 3701:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config, atom),
 3702:     BaseOpts = [{active, true}, {versions, [Version]}, {protocol, tls_or_dtls(Version)}],
 3703:     ServerOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3704:     ClientOpts = BaseOpts ++ proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config, []),
 3705: 
 3706:     Label = <<"EXPERIMENTAL-otp">>,
 3707: 
 3708:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(
 3709:                     [return_socket,
 3710:                      {node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, {from, self()},
 3711:                      {options, ServerOpts}]),
 3712:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3713:     {_, ClientS} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 3714:                                              {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
 3715:                                              {options, ClientOpts}]),
 3716: 
 3717:     Server ! get_socket,
 3718:     ServerS = receive
 3719:                   {Server, {socket, S}} -> S
 3720:               end,
 3721: 
 3722:     case Version of
 3723:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 3724:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 3725:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials} = ssl:prf(ClientS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32);
 3726:         _ ->
 3727:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials1} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random], 32),
 3728:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials1} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random], 32),
 3729:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials2} = ssl:prf(ServerS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 3730:             {ok, ExportKeyMaterials2} = ssl:prf(ClientS, master_secret, Label, [client_random, server_random, <<>>], 32),
 3731:             true = ExportKeyMaterials1 =/= ExportKeyMaterials2
 3732:     end.
 3733: 
 3734: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3735: 
 3736: establish_connection(Id, ServerNode, ServerOpts, ClientNode, ClientOpts, Hostname) ->
 3737:     Server =
 3738:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 3739:                                    {from, self()},
 3740:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, get_connection_information,
 3741:                                           [Id, server_random]}},
 3742:                                    {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
 3743: 
 3744:     ListenPort = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 3745:     Client =
 3746:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, ListenPort},
 3747:                                    {host, Hostname},
 3748:                                    {from, self()},
 3749:                                    {mfa, {?MODULE, get_connection_information,
 3750:                                           [Id, client_random]}},
 3751:                                    {options,  [{verify, verify_peer} |ClientOpts]}]),
 3752: 
 3753:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
 3754:     {Server, Client}.
 3755: 
 3756: %%% Checker functions
 3757: get_connection_information(Socket, ConnectionId, InfoType) ->
 3758:     {ok, [ConnectionInfo]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [InfoType]),
 3759:     {ConnectionId, ConnectionInfo, secs_since_1970()}.
 3760: secs_since_1970() ->
 3761:     calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(
 3762:         calendar:universal_time()) - 62167219200.
 3763: 
 3764: connection_information_result(Socket) ->
 3765:     {ok, Info = [_ | _]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket),
 3766:     case  length(Info) > 3 of
 3767: 	true -> 
 3768: 	    %% At least one ssl_option() is set
 3769: 	    ?CT_LOG("Info ~p", [Info]),
 3770: 	    ok;
 3771: 	false ->
 3772: 	    ct:fail(no_ssl_options_returned)
 3773:     end.
 3774: 
 3775: secret_connection_info_result(Socket) ->
 3776:     {ok, [{protocol, Protocol}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]),
 3777:     {ok, ConnInfo} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [client_random, server_random, master_secret]),
 3778:     check_connection_info(Protocol, ConnInfo).
 3779: 
 3780: keylog_connection_info_result(Socket, KeepSecrets) ->
 3781:     {ok, [{protocol, Protocol}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]),
 3782:     {ok, ConnInfo} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [keylog]),
 3783:     check_keylog_info(Protocol, ConnInfo, KeepSecrets).
 3784: 
 3785: check_keylog_info('tlsv1.3', [{keylog, ["CLIENT_HANDSHAKE_TRAFFIC_SECRET"++_,_|_]=Keylog}], true) ->
 3786:     {ok, Keylog};
 3787: check_keylog_info('tlsv1.3', []=Keylog, false) ->
 3788:     {ok, Keylog};
 3789: check_keylog_info(_, [{keylog, ["CLIENT_RANDOM"++_]=Keylog}], _) ->
 3790:     {ok, Keylog};
 3791: check_keylog_info(_, Unexpected, Keep) ->
 3792:     {unexpected, Keep, Unexpected}.
 3793: 
 3794: check_srp_in_connection_information(_Socket, _Username, client) ->
 3795:     ok;
 3796: check_srp_in_connection_information(Socket, Username, server) ->
 3797:     {ok, Info} = ssl:connection_information(Socket),
 3798:     ?CT_LOG("Info ~p~n", [Info]),
 3799:     case proplists:get_value(srp_username, Info, not_found) of
 3800:         Username ->
 3801: 	        ok;
 3802:         not_found ->
 3803:             ct:fail(srp_username_not_found)
 3804:     end.
 3805: 
 3806: %% In TLS 1.3 the master_secret field is used to store multiple secrets from the key schedule and it is a tuple.
 3807: %% client_random and server_random are not used in the TLS 1.3 key schedule.
 3808: check_connection_info('tlsv1.3', [{client_random, ClientRand},{server_random, ServerRand},
 3809:                                   {master_secret, {master_secret, MasterSecret}}]) ->
 3810:     is_binary(ClientRand) andalso is_binary(ServerRand) andalso is_binary(MasterSecret);
 3811: check_connection_info(_, [{client_random, ClientRand}, {server_random, ServerRand}, {master_secret, MasterSecret}]) ->
 3812:     is_binary(ClientRand) andalso is_binary(ServerRand) andalso is_binary(MasterSecret);
 3813: check_connection_info(_, _) ->
 3814:     false.
 3815: 
 3816: try_recv_active(Socket) ->
 3817:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello world"),
 3818:     {error, einval} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 3819:     ok.
 3820: try_recv_active_once(Socket) ->
 3821:     {error, einval} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 3822:     ok.
 3823: 
 3824: controlling_process_result(Socket, Pid, Msg) ->
 3825:     ok = ssl:controlling_process(Socket, Pid),
 3826:     %% Make sure other side has evaluated controlling_process
 3827:     %% before message is sent
 3828:     ct:sleep(?SLEEP),
 3829:     ssl:send(Socket, Msg),
 3830:     no_result_msg.
 3831: 
 3832: controller_dies_result(_Socket, _Pid, _Msg) ->
 3833:     receive Result -> Result end.
 3834: send_recv_result_timeout_client(Socket) ->
 3835:     try ssl:recv(Socket, 11, not_infinity) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 3836:     try ssl:recv(Socket, 11, -1) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 3837:     try ssl:recv(Socket, not_integer, 500) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 3838:     try ssl:recv(Socket, -1, 500) catch error : function_clause -> ok end,
 3839:     {error, timeout} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 500),
 3840:     {error, timeout} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 0),
 3841:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello world"),
 3842:     receive
 3843: 	Msg ->
 3844: 	    io:format("Msg ~p~n",[Msg])
 3845:     after 500 ->
 3846: 	    ok
 3847:     end,
 3848:     {ok, "Hello world"} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11, 500),
 3849:     ok.
 3850: send_recv_result_timeout_server(Socket) ->
 3851:     ssl:send(Socket, "Hello"),
 3852:     {ok, "Hello world"} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 3853:     ssl:send(Socket, " world"),
 3854:     ok.
 3855: 
 3856: do_recv_close(Socket) ->
 3857:     {error, closed} = ssl:recv(Socket, 11),
 3858:     receive
 3859: 	{_,{error,closed}} ->
 3860: 	    error_extra_close_sent_to_user_process
 3861:     after 500 ->
 3862: 	    ok
 3863:     end.
 3864: 
 3865: tls_close(Socket) ->
 3866:     ok = ssl_test_lib:send_recv_result(Socket),
 3867:     %% So both sides will have time to send
 3868:     %% and recv before close is called, as this
 3869:     %% function will be called by both client
 3870:     %% and server in the test.
 3871:     ct:sleep(100),
 3872:     case ssl:close(Socket, 10000) of
 3873:         ok ->
 3874:             ok;
 3875:         {error, closed} ->
 3876:             ok;
 3877:         Other ->
 3878:             ct:fail(Other)
 3879:     end.
 3880: 
 3881: run_error_server_close([Pid | Opts]) ->
 3882:     {ok, Listen} = ssl:listen(0, Opts),
 3883:     {ok,{_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(Listen),
 3884:     Pid ! {self(), Port},
 3885:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:transport_accept(Listen),
 3886:     Pid ! ssl:close(Socket).
 3887: 
 3888: run_error_server([ Pid | Opts]) ->
 3889:     {ok, Listen} = ssl:listen(0, Opts),
 3890:     {ok,{_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(Listen),
 3891:     Pid ! {self(), Port},
 3892:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:transport_accept(Listen),
 3893:     Pid ! ssl:controlling_process(Socket, self()).
 3894: 
 3895: run_client_error([Port, Opts]) ->
 3896:     ssl:connect("localhost", Port, Opts).
 3897: 
 3898: no_recv_no_active(Socket) ->
 3899:     receive
 3900:         {ssl_closed, Socket} ->
 3901:             ct:fail(received_active_msg)
 3902:     after 5000 ->
 3903:             ok
 3904:     end.
 3905: 
 3906: connection_info_result(Socket) ->
 3907:     {ok, Info} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol, selected_cipher_suite]),
 3908:     {ok, {proplists:get_value(protocol, Info), proplists:get_value(selected_cipher_suite, Info)}}.
 3909: 
 3910: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3911: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 3912: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 3913: 
 3914: tls_or_dtls('dtlsv1') ->
 3915:     dtls;
 3916: tls_or_dtls('dtlsv1.2') ->
 3917:     dtls;
 3918: tls_or_dtls(_) ->
 3919:     tls.
 3920: 
 3921: active_n_common(S, N) ->
 3922:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-N}]),
 3923:     receive
 3924:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 3925:     after
 3926:         1000 ->
 3927:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure})
 3928:     end,
 3929:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 3930:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,0}]),
 3931:     receive
 3932:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 3933:     after
 3934:         1000 ->
 3935:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure})
 3936:     end,
 3937:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,32767}]),
 3938:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,1}]),
 3939:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-32769}]),
 3940:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,-32768}]),
 3941:     receive
 3942:         {ssl_passive, S} -> ok
 3943:     after
 3944:         1000 ->
 3945:             error({error,ssl_passive_failure})
 3946:     end,
 3947:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 3948:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 3949:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,true}]),
 3950:     [{active,true}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 3951:     receive
 3952:         _ -> error({error,active_n})
 3953:     after
 3954:         0 ->
 3955:             ok
 3956:     end,
 3957:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,N}]),
 3958:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,once}]),
 3959:     [{active,once}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 3960:     receive
 3961:         _ -> error({error,active_n})
 3962:     after
 3963:         0 ->
 3964:             ok
 3965:     end,
 3966:     {error,{options,_}} = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,32768}]),
 3967:     ok = ssl:setopts(S, [{active,false}]),
 3968:     [{active,false}] = ok(ssl:getopts(S, [active])),
 3969:     ok.
 3970: 
 3971: ok({ok,V}) -> V.
 3972: 
 3973: repeat(N, Fun) ->
 3974:     Repeat = fun F(Arg) when is_integer(Arg), Arg > 0 -> Fun(N - Arg), F(Arg - 1);
 3975:                         F(_) -> ok end,
 3976:     Repeat(N).
 3977: 
 3978: 
 3979: get_close(Pid, Where) ->
 3980:     receive
 3981: 	{'EXIT', Pid, _Reason} ->
 3982: 	    receive
 3983: 		{_, {ssl_closed, Socket}} ->
 3984: 		    ?CT_LOG("Socket closed ~p~n",[Socket]);
 3985: 		Unexpected ->
 3986: 		    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 3987: 		    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 3988: 	    after 5000 ->
 3989: 		    ct:fail({timeout, {line, ?LINE, Where}})
 3990: 	    end;
 3991: 	Unexpected ->
 3992: 	    ?CT_LOG("Unexpected ~p~n",[Unexpected]),
 3993: 	    ct:fail({line, ?LINE-1})
 3994:     after 5000 ->
 3995: 	    ct:fail({timeout, {line, ?LINE, Where}})
 3996:     end.
 3997: 
 3998: ssl_active_recv(N) ->
 3999:     ssl_active_recv(N, []).
 4000: 
 4001: ssl_active_recv(0, Acc) ->
 4002:     Acc;
 4003: ssl_active_recv(N, Acc) ->
 4004:     receive 
 4005: 	{ssl, _, Bytes} ->
 4006:             ssl_active_recv(N-length(Bytes),  Acc ++ Bytes)
 4007:     end.

 4011: honor_cipher_order(Config, Honor, ServerCiphers, ClientCiphers, Expected) ->
 4012:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4013:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4014: 
 4015:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4016: 
 4017:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4018: 					{from, self()},
 4019: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4020: 					{options, [{ciphers, ServerCiphers}, {honor_cipher_order, Honor}
 4021: 						   | ServerOpts]}]),
 4022:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4023:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4024: 					{host, Hostname},
 4025: 					{from, self()},
 4026: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4027: 					{options, [{ciphers, ClientCiphers}
 4028: 						   | ClientOpts]}]),
 4029: 
 4030:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
 4031: 
 4032:     ServerMsg = ClientMsg = {ok, {Version, Expected}},
 4033: 
 4034:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ServerMsg, Client, ClientMsg),
 4035: 
 4036:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 4037:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 4038: 
 4039: cookie_extension(Config, Cookie) ->
 4040:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4041:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4042:     Data = "123456789012345",  %% 15 bytes
 4043: 
 4044:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4045: 
 4046:     %% Trigger a HelloRetryRequest
 4047:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4048: 					{from, self()},
 4049: 					{options, [{supported_groups, [x448,
 4050:                                                                        secp256r1,
 4051:                                                                        secp384r1]},
 4052:                                                    {cookie, Cookie}|ServerOpts]}]),
 4053:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4054:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4055: 					{host, Hostname},
 4056: 					{from, self()},
 4057: 					{options, ClientOpts}]),
 4058: 
 4059:     ok = ssl_test_lib:send(Client, Data),
 4060:     Data = ssl_test_lib:check_active_receive(Server, Data),
 4061: 
 4062:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
 4063:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
 4064: 
 4065: start_client_negative(Config, Options, Error) ->
 4066:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
 4067:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4068:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(ServerNode),
 4069:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4070: 					{host, Hostname},
 4071: 					{from, self()},
 4072:                                         {return_error, econnrefused},
 4073: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4074: 					{options, Options ++ ClientOpts}]),
 4075:     ?CT_LOG("Actual: ~p~nExpected: ~p", [Client, {connect_failed, Error}]),
 4076:     {connect_failed, Error} = Client.
 4077: 
 4078: start_server_negative(Config, Options, Error) ->
 4079:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
 4080:     {_, ServerNode, _} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4081:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4082: 					{from, self()},
 4083: 					{mfa, {?MODULE, connection_info_result, []}},
 4084: 					{options,  Options ++ ServerOpts}]),
 4085: 
 4086:     ?CT_LOG("Actual: ~p~nExpected: ~p", [Server,Error]),
 4087:     Error = Server.
 4088: 
 4089: der_input_opts(Opts) ->
 4090:     Certfile = proplists:get_value(certfile, Opts),
 4091:     CaCertsfile = proplists:get_value(cacertfile, Opts),
 4092:     Keyfile = proplists:get_value(keyfile, Opts),
 4093:     Dhfile = proplists:get_value(dhfile, Opts),
 4094:     [{_, Cert, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Certfile),
 4095:     [{Asn1Type, Key, _}]  = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Keyfile),
 4096:     [{_, DHParams, _}]  = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Dhfile),
 4097:     CaCerts =
 4098: 	lists:map(fun(Entry) ->
 4099: 			  {_, CaCert, _} = Entry,
 4100: 			  CaCert
 4101: 		  end, ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(CaCertsfile)),
 4102:     {Cert, {Asn1Type, Key}, CaCerts, DHParams}.
 4103: 
 4104: ssl_getstat(Socket) ->
 4105:     ssl:send(Socket, "From Erlang to Erlang"),
 4106:     {ok, Stats} = ssl:getstat(Socket),
 4107:     List = lists:dropwhile(fun({_, 0}) ->
 4108:                                    true;
 4109:                               ({_, _}) ->
 4110:                                    false
 4111:                            end, Stats),
 4112:     case List of
 4113:         [] ->
 4114:             nok;
 4115:         _  ->
 4116:             ok
 4117:     end.
 4118: 
 4119: test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni('tlsv1.3') ->
 4120:     {'tlsv1.2', ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']};
 4121: test_versions_for_option_based_on_sni('tlsv1.2') ->
 4122:     {'tlsv1.1', ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.1']}.
 4123: 
 4124: protocol_version_check(Socket, Version) ->
 4125:     case ssl:connection_information(Socket, [protocol]) of
 4126:         {ok, [{protocol, Version}]} ->
 4127:             ok;
 4128:         Other ->
 4129:             ct:fail({expected, Version, got, Other})
 4130:     end.
 4131: 
 4132: log(#{msg:={report,_Report}},#{config:=Pid}) ->
 4133:     Pid ! warning_generated;
 4134: log(_,_) ->
 4135:     ok.
 4136: 
 4137: length_exclusive(Version) when ?TLS_1_X(Version) ->
 4138:     length(exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version)) +
 4139:         length(exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version));
 4140: length_exclusive(Version) when ?DTLS_1_X(Version)->
 4141:     length(dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version)) +
 4142:         length(dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version)).
 4143: 
 4144: length_all(Version) ->
 4145:     length(ssl:cipher_suites(all, Version)).
 4146: 
 4147: exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4148:     lists:flatmap(fun (Vsn) -> ssl:cipher_suites(exclusive, Vsn) end
 4149:                  , exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4150: 
 4151: exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_3) -> [?TLS_1_3, ?TLS_1_2, ?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4152: exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_2) -> [?TLS_1_2, ?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4153: exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_1) -> [?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4154: exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_0) -> [?TLS_1_0].
 4155: 
 4156: 
 4157: 
 4158: dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4159:     lists:flatmap( fun (Vsn) -> ssl:cipher_suites(exclusive, Vsn) end
 4160:                  , dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4161: 
 4162: dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?DTLS_1_2) -> [?DTLS_1_0, ?DTLS_1_2];
 4163: dtls_exclusive_default_up_to_version_helper(?DTLS_1_0) -> [?DTLS_1_0].
 4164: 
 4165: 
 4166: 
 4167: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4168:     lists:flatmap(fun exclusive_non_default_version/1
 4169:                  , exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4170: 
 4171: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_3) -> [?TLS_1_2, ?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4172: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_2) -> [?TLS_1_2, ?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4173: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_1) -> [?TLS_1_1, ?TLS_1_0];
 4174: exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?TLS_1_0) -> [?TLS_1_0].
 4175: 
 4176: 
 4177: dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version(Version) ->
 4178:     lists:flatmap( fun dtls_exclusive_non_default_version/1
 4179:                  , dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(Version)).
 4180: 
 4181: dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?DTLS_1_2) -> [?DTLS_1_0, ?DTLS_1_2];
 4182: dtls_exclusive_non_default_up_to_version_helper(?DTLS_1_0) -> [?DTLS_1_0].
 4183: 
 4184: 
 4185: exclusive_non_default_version(Version) ->
 4186:     Ls = [ fun tls_v1:psk_exclusive/1
 4187:          , fun tls_v1:srp_exclusive/1
 4188:          , fun tls_v1:rsa_exclusive/1
 4189:          , fun tls_v1:des_exclusive/1
 4190:          , fun tls_v1:rc4_exclusive/1],
 4191:     lists:flatmap(fun(Fn) -> Fn(Version) end, Ls).
 4192: 
 4193: dtls_exclusive_non_default_version(DTLSVersion) ->        
 4194:     Version = ssl:tls_version(DTLSVersion),
 4195:     Fns = [ fun tls_v1:psk_exclusive/1
 4196:           , fun tls_v1:srp_exclusive/1
 4197:           , fun tls_v1:rsa_exclusive/1
 4198:           , fun tls_v1:des_exclusive/1],
 4199:     lists:flatmap(fun (Fn) -> Fn(Version) end, Fns).
 4200: 
 4201: selected_peer(ExpectedClient,
 4202:               ExpectedServer, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config) ->
 4203:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 4204: 
 4205:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 4206: 					{from, self()},
 4207:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_peercert, [ExpectedServer]}},
 4208:                                         {options, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ServerOpts, Config)}]),
 4209:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
 4210: 
 4211:     Client  = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
 4212:                                          {host, Hostname},
 4213:                                          {from, self()},
 4214:                                          {mfa, {?MODULE, check_peercert, [ExpectedClient]}},
 4215:                                          {options,  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ClientOpts, Config)}
 4216: 					]),
 4217: 
 4218:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
 4219:     %% Make sure to start next test fresh
 4220:     ssl:stop(),
 4221:     ssl:start().
 4222: 
 4223: test_config('tlsv1.3', _) ->
 4224:     #{server_config := SEDDSAOpts,
 4225:       client_config := CEDDSAOpts} = eddsa_cert_chains(),
 4226:     #{server_config := SECDSAOpts,
 4227:       client_config := CECDSAOpts } = ecdsa_cert_chains(),
 4228: 
 4229:     {SEDDSACert, SEDDSAKey, SEDDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SEDDSAOpts),
 4230:     {CEDDSACert, CEDDSAKey, CEDDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, CEDDSAOpts),
 4231: 
 4232:     {SECDSACert, SECDSAKey, SECDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SECDSAOpts),
 4233:     {CECDSACert, CECDSAKey, CECDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, CECDSAOpts),
 4234: 
 4235:     ServerCertKeys = [#{cert => SECDSACert, key => SECDSAKey},
 4236:                       #{cert => SEDDSACert, key => SEDDSAKey}],
 4237: 
 4238:     ClientCertKeys = [#{cert => CECDSACert, key => CECDSAKey},
 4239:                       #{cert => CEDDSACert, key => CEDDSAKey}],
 4240: 
 4241:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys,ServerCertKeys},
 4242:                           {verify, verify_peer},  {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4243:                           {cacerts, SEDDSACACerts ++ SECDSACACerts}],
 4244:         client_config => [{certs_keys, ClientCertKeys},
 4245:                           {verify, verify_peer}, {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4246:                           {cacerts, CEDDSACACerts ++ CECDSACACerts}]
 4247:        },
 4248:       {client_peer, SEDDSACert}, {server_peer, CEDDSACert}},
 4249:      {#{server_config => [{certs_keys, ServerCertKeys},
 4250:                           {verify, verify_peer}, {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4251:                           {cacerts, SEDDSACACerts ++ SECDSACACerts}],
 4252:         client_config => [{certs_keys, ClientCertKeys},
 4253:                           {verify, verify_peer},  {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4254:                           {cacerts, CEDDSACACerts ++ CECDSACACerts}]},
 4255:       {client_peer, SECDSACert}, {server_peer, CECDSACert}}
 4256:     ];

 4258:     #{server_config := SRSAOpts,
 4259:       client_config := CRSAOpts} = eddsa_cert_chains(),
 4260:     #{server_config := SDSAOpts,
 4261:       client_config := CDSAOpts} = dsa_cert_chains(),
 4262: 
 4263:     {SRSACert, SRSAKey, SRSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts, SRSAOpts),
 4264:     {CRSACert, CRSAKey, CRSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts,  CRSAOpts),
 4265:

 4267:     {CDSACert, CDSAKey, CDSACACerts} = get_single_options(cert, key, cacerts,  CDSAOpts),
 4268:

 4270: 
 4271:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys,
 4272:                            [#{cert => SDSACert, key => SDSAKey},
 4273:                             #{cert => SRSACert, key => SRSAKey}]},
 4274:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4275:                           {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4276:                           {cacerts, SRSACACerts ++ SDSACACerts}],
 4277:         client_config => [{certs_keys,
 4278:                            [#{cert => CDSACert, key => CDSAKey},
 4279:                             #{cert => CRSACert, key => CRSAKey}]},
 4280:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4281:                           {versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
 4282:                           {cacerts, CRSACACerts ++ CDSACACerts}]
 4283:        },
 4284:       {client_peer, SRSACert}, {server_peer, CRSACert}},
 4285:      {#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{cert => SDSACert, key => SDSAKey},
 4286:                                         #{cert => SRSACert, key => SRSAKey}]},
 4287:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4288:                           AllSigAlgs1_2,
 4289:                           {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4290:                           {cacerts, SRSACACerts ++ SDSACACerts}],
 4291:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{cert => CDSACert, key => CDSAKey},
 4292:                                         #{cert => CRSACert, key => CRSAKey}]},
 4293:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4294:                           {versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
 4295:                           AllSigAlgs1_2,
 4296:                           {cacerts, CRSACACerts ++ CDSACACerts}]
 4297:        },
 4298:       {client_peer, SDSACert}, {server_peer, CDSACert}}];
 4299: test_config('dtlsv1.2', Config) ->
 4300:     #{server_config := SRSAPSSOpts,
 4301:       client_config := CRSAPSSOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_pss_pss, [], Config, "dtls_pss_pss_conf"),
 4302:     #{server_config := SRSAPSSRSAEOpts,
 4303:       client_config := CRSAPSSRSAEOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_pss_rsae, [], Config, "dtls_pss_rsae_conf"),
 4304: 
 4305:     {SRSAPSSCert, SRSAPSSKey, SRSAPSSCACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSAPSSOpts),
 4306:     {CRSAPSSCert, CRSAPSSKey, CRSAPSSCACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile,  CRSAPSSOpts),
 4307:

 4309:     {CRSAPSSRSAECert, CRSAPSSRSAEKey, CRSAPSSRSAECACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, CRSAPSSRSAEOpts),
 4310: 
 4311:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => SRSAPSSRSAECert, keyfile => SRSAPSSRSAEKey},

 4320:        },

 4322:      {#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => SRSAPSSRSAECert, keyfile => SRSAPSSRSAEKey},
 4323:                                         #{certfile => SRSAPSSCert, keyfile => SRSAPSSKey}]},
 4324:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4325:                           {cacertfile, SRSAPSSRSAECACerts}],
 4326:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => CRSAPSSRSAECert, keyfile => CRSAPSSRSAEKey}]},
 4327:                           {verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha256]},
 4328:                           {cacertfile, CRSAPSSRSAECACerts}]
 4329:        },
 4330:       {client_peer, pem_to_der_cert(SRSAPSSRSAECert)}, {server_peer, pem_to_der_cert(CRSAPSSRSAECert)}}
 4331:     ];
 4332: test_config(_, Config) ->
 4333:     RSAConf1 = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config),
 4334:     SRSA1Opts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, RSAConf1),
 4335:     CRSA1Opts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, RSAConf1),
 4336: 
 4337:     RSAConf2 = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_1024_cert(Config),
 4338:     SRSA2Opts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_1024_opts, RSAConf2),
 4339:     CRSA2Opts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_1024_opts, RSAConf2),
 4340: 
 4341:     {SRSA1Cert, SRSA1Key, _SRSA1CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSA1Opts),
 4342:     {CRSA1Cert, CRSA1Key, _CRSA1CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, CRSA1Opts),
 4343: 
 4344:     {SRSA2Cert, SRSA2Key, SRSA2CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, SRSA2Opts),
 4345:     {CRSA2Cert, CRSA2Key, CRSA2CACerts} = get_single_options(certfile, keyfile, cacertfile, CRSA2Opts),
 4346: 
 4347:     [{#{server_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => SRSA2Cert, keyfile => SRSA2Key},
 4348:                                         #{certfile => SRSA1Cert, keyfile => SRSA1Key}]},
 4349:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4350:                           {cacertfile, SRSA2CACerts}],
 4351:         client_config => [{certs_keys, [#{certfile => CRSA2Cert, keyfile  => CRSA2Key},
 4352:                                         #{certfile => CRSA1Cert, keyfile => CRSA1Key}]},
 4353:                           {verify, verify_peer},
 4354:                           {cacertfile, CRSA2CACerts}]
 4355:        }, {client_peer,  pem_to_der_cert(SRSA2Cert)}, {server_peer, pem_to_der_cert(CRSA2Cert)}}].
 4356: 
 4357: check_peercert(Socket, Cert) ->
 4358:     case ssl:peercert(Socket) of
 4359:         {ok, Cert} ->
 4360:             ok;
 4361:         {ok, Other} ->
 4362:             {error, {{expected, public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Cert, otp)}, {got, public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Other, otp)}}}
 4363:     end.
 4364: 
 4365: 
 4366: eddsa_cert_chains() ->
 4367:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
 4368:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
 4369:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()},
 4370:                                 client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
 4371:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
 4372:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()}}).
 4373: 
 4374: ecdsa_cert_chains() ->
 4375:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf(),
 4376:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()],
 4377:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()},
 4378:                                 client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf(),
 4379:                                                   intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()],
 4380:                                                   peer =>  ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()}}).
 4381: dsa_cert_chains() ->
 4382:     public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(1)}],
 4383:                                                   intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(2)}]],
 4384:                                                   peer =>  [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(3)}]
 4385:                                                  },
 4386:                                 client_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(3)}],
 4387:                                                   intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(2)}]],
 4388:                                                   peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_dsa_key(1)}]}}).
 4389: 
 4390: get_single_options(CertOptName, KeyOptName, CaOptName, Opts) ->
 4391:     CertOpt = proplists:get_value(CertOptName, Opts),
 4392:     KeyOpt = proplists:get_value(KeyOptName, Opts),
 4393:     CaOpt = proplists:get_value(CaOptName, Opts),
 4394:     {CertOpt, KeyOpt, CaOpt}.
 4395: 
 4396: pem_to_der_cert(Pem) ->
 4397:     [{'Certificate', Der, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(Pem),
 4398:     Der.
 4399: 
 4400: test_sha1_cert_conf('tlsv1.3'= Version, RSA, ECDSA, Config) ->
 4401:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, ECDSA, Config, ecdsa_sha1),
 4402:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, rsa_pkcs1_sha1);
 4403: test_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, ECDSA, Config) when Version == 'tlsv1.2';
 4404:                                                       Version == 'dtlsv1.2' ->
 4405:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, {sha, rsa}),
 4406:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, ECDSA, Config, {sha, ecdsa});
 4407: test_sha1_cert_conf(Version,RSA,_,Config) ->
 4408:     run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, RSA, Config, undefined).
 4409: 
 4410: run_sha1_cert_conf('tlsv1.3', #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) ->
 4411:     SigAlgs = [%% ECDSA
 4412:                ecdsa_secp521r1_sha512,
 4413:                ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
 4414:                ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
 4415:                %% RSASSA-PSS
 4416:                rsa_pss_pss_sha512,
 4417:                rsa_pss_pss_sha384,
 4418:                rsa_pss_pss_sha256,
 4419:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,
 4420:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha384,
 4421:                rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
 4422:                %% EDDSA
 4423:                eddsa_ed25519,
 4424:                eddsa_ed448
 4425:               ],
 4426:     IncludeLegacyAlg =  SigAlgs ++ [LegacyAlg],
 4427:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert([{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  SigAlgs} | ClientOpts],
 4428:                              [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts], Config, handshake_failure),
 4429:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ClientOpts],
 4430:                                     [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts], Config);
 4431: 
 4432: run_sha1_cert_conf(Version, #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) when Version == 'tlsv1.2';
 4433:                                                                                                                  Version == 'dtlsv1.2' ->
 4434:     SigAlgs =  [%% SHA2
 4435:                 {sha512, ecdsa},
 4436:                 {sha512, rsa},
 4437:                 {sha384, ecdsa},
 4438:                 {sha384, rsa},
 4439:                 {sha256, ecdsa},
 4440:                 {sha256, rsa},
 4441:                 {sha224, ecdsa},
 4442:                 {sha224, rsa}],
 4443:     IncludeLegacyAlg = SigAlgs ++ [LegacyAlg],
 4444:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test( [{verify, verify_peer}, {signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ClientOpts],
 4445:                              [{signature_algs,  IncludeLegacyAlg} | ServerOpts], Config);
 4446: run_sha1_cert_conf(_, #{client_config := ClientOpts, server_config := ServerOpts}, Config, LegacyAlg) ->
 4447:     NVersion = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 4448:     SigOpts = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(LegacyAlg, NVersion),
 4449:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts] ++ SigOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 4450: 
 4451:
